product_review: After 10 15 minutes of use my ears started burning when I got home I noticed that I had bleeding open wounds on my ears located where the airpods rest. I'm glad I wasn't more seriously injured. The pain continued for over 6 hours even after washing the area.

review_title: Caught in war between Apple & Amazon
product_review: I ordered these the 1st day they were available and received them today.  They connected easily but on the 1st song I played the audio started slowing down less than a minute in and distorted the vocals and music.  I thought maybe it‚Äôs just a glitch because they are only 75% charged so I charged them up and reconnected them and it was even worse than before.  I called Apple support and spoke to 2 women who were beyond slow and the opposite of geniuses.  I was told the 2nd one was a senior supervisor not sure what her qualifications were as she was as inept and unhelpful as her subordinate. After 37 minutes on the call timer and being on hold over 5x I hung up.  I‚Äôm going to the Apple store tomorrow.  So I went to the Apple store and with help from the guys there we were able to determine the music issue only happens with Amazon music -  which is my service of choice.  I‚Äôve been checking everyday for an update to fix this glitch.  Apple said they will take them back if one doesn‚Äôt come out in the next week or so.  I hate being a casualty in someone‚Äôs else‚Äôs war....üòï
I go to the gym and with these they were so good my head exploded in tiny pieces

review_title: Doesn‚Äôt work well with Amazon music app
product_review: Does not work properly with amazon music. Slows down and speeds up randomly, mostly when switching apps. My other pair of wireless headphones still works fine with amazon music. So it must just be the AirPods. Works perfectly fine with Apple Music, no glitches, but I do not have the Apple Music subscription... so this is clearly a ploy by Apple to get people to solely use their music app. Pretty annoyed by it since I have the amazon music with my amazon prime subscription.
Perfect! Came brand new in the box, almost fully charged, everything perfect and sealed.

I purchased these during Prime days since they were advertised as the 2nd generation airpods with wireless charging case. Received on time and was pleased with the ease of connectivity and music playback as i worked outside. The main reason i purchased these was to be handsfree during my workday making and receiving calls. I immediately received feedback from the other party on calls that they couldn't hear me at all and that it was just static/ bad connection sounds when using the right airpod, left worked great. Needless to say that frustrated me consider the costs of these airpods. I reached out to apple support for advise and was sent to my local Best buy for repair/replacement of the right airpod. Best buy scanned the serial number on the box to order a replacement for me and informed me that these were in fact not 2nd generation airpods, that the model numbers listed on each one of them were 1st generation so that explains the issues I'm having. I feel i should be able to exchange these for 2nd generation airpods as that is what i purchased. Be mindful of the serial numbers listed on the actual airpods to confirm they are the second generation - First gen airpods serial numbers are : AirPods (1st generation)

First, I am reviewing this based on price! It was advertised at $139. I was charged $199. The original in the post was $159 scratched out with the $139 below it. I would like my refund please! Also, K do not know how to wrk these. They fall out, hurt my ears, and only one of them work half of the time, also nothing happens when touching or tapping them. I cannot make anything happen by talking. I can get Siri to answer me after awhile of yelling at her, and that‚Äôs it. Other than that, I really don‚Äôt understand these things!
received fake airpods :/ working on refunding them

First time I‚Äôve been taken on a product. These are not genuine Apple AirPods. These are knockoffs do not buy. Compared immediately with my friends Pods and the case was different, writing is different, seams in the Pods themselves that proven they are poorly made, did not connect right away, died instantly.

review_title: These have a specific place in daily life and exercise.
product_review: Update:  So I still love these earbuds but they have a place.  Since I started using these I‚Äôve bought the AirPods Pro too and because of that and the use of Jabra Elite 65T Active I‚Äôve decided these have their own place.  So I live in an area with all 4 seasons.  So I run outside in the cold along with when it is warm.  Despite the fact that these are not rated as water or sweet resistant at all I decided to go ahead and try them.  For me these stay put really good in my ear (for running and normal use). They will not work well for functional training and will probably fall out.  Their sound quality compared to the Jabra and even better the AirPods Pro are much more flat.  Not much base at all in these.  So the place I‚Äôve decided to place these in my life.  If I‚Äôm in an atmosphere where I want to hear what is going on around me I still prefer these over the AirPods Pro which have the ‚Äútransparency mode‚Äù.  Also as I‚Äôm running outside I love the transparency mode on the AirPods Pro (AirPods Pro put their ‚Äúhear through‚Äù feature on the Jabra Elite 65 T to shame).  But that being said if I‚Äôm wearing a winter hat you can hear the hat rubbing on the mics on the AirPods Pro.  You don‚Äôt get that with these.  So I‚Äôll wear these while wearing a hat when running during colder weather and I‚Äôm still able to hear my surroundings without any distortion.  So for pairing, once paired these things are amazing.  I can walk around my entire house and not have any drops.  Now, Apple‚Äôs claim to fame is Airplay and the ability for you AirPods to switch seamlessly between Apple devices.  Well it doesn‚Äôt really work as seamless as they would like or we would like.  There are many times where I will switch to my Apple Watch to stream music to my AirPods and only one of the AirPods connect.  And something that has happened maybe twice they were not even recognizable.  The fix always seems to be just putting them back in the case, closing the lid, waiting a second or two and then it works.  It is just weird because there seems to be no reason to this problem.  It is completely random to even which single AirPod it connects to.  I haven‚Äôt removed a star for this fact because although annoying at times it still is a simple fix and a solid connection once they connect.  I hope this update helps.
Bought for my lovely bride who sleeps with headphones on.  By the morning she is all wrapped up in cords. Now she won‚Äôt strangle herself at night

I purchased these as a gift for my daughters birthday. No where in the description of this product does it mention that these are REFURBISHED and NOT new as one would expect. When they arrived, the AirPods were packaged as if they came directly off the shelf at the Apple store. However, once I opened the package I noticed scratches on the case and dirt underneath the AirPods. Also, the clear sleeve that protects the charging case was tapped down giving the illusion they were NEW. I attempted to charge the AirPods but I could never get the right AirPod to 100%. Once connected to Bluetooth I attempted to adjust the settings but the settings never appeared. After doing additional research I notice the AirPods serial number on the case didn‚Äôt match the serial number on the box?? If Amazon is going to continue selling these they need to be very clear that these are indeed REFURBISHED and NOT new. I WILL BE RETURNING these to Amazon IMMEDIATELY. I would recommended purchasing Apple products directly from Apple.
Works perfectly well and also just as described. It‚Äôs new also

review_title: Watch out for fakes. Ordered "brand new" and checked serial number on apple website.
product_review: Returned the fake airpods and bought brand new airpods. There are multiple websites that will show you how to spot a fake, but still the best way is to cross check the serial number on apple's website.

review_title: Great product and fast delivery by Amazon
product_review: It is not same as previous version. visually it looks same but it is much faster and Siri works great if you like running and other sports activities . I would say buy this version it is more useful

review_title: Definitely worth the money, if you're an apple loyalist (ex. Apple music, iPhone, Watch, etc...)
product_review: I was on the fence for a while on buying airpods. I recommend buying airpods if you have an apple watch and iPhone. It connects very well for both devices and is fluid if you switch between both of them.
When I got the headphones, I thought the headphones that on the left were broken. Fortunately, I finally found that I was deaf.

I really wanted to like these earbuds/airpods but alas no go. The battery life was zilch. And the connection to my iphone kept dropping everytime I was a short distance away from the phone. Tech support was no help. The person kept having me do the same thing expecting difference results.. epic fail there. I am now using my husbands $5.00 dollar headphones which sucks, but at least I can listen to music. I am dissapointed in apple.

Recently purchased this item. It didn‚Äôt say anything about being used or refurbished which is misleading. Product came without the proper packaging and the product itself wasn‚Äôt even cleaned (which is gross considering this was in someone else‚Äôs ears). Just buy straight from Apple and save yourself the frustration.

Noticeably better than the previous generation in sound quality. The 2nd one feels to work the same, but the audio quality is noticeable. Where the 1st was very mediocre and had no bass or great mid, the 2nd is a quite a bit better at (and I think louder but not sure if my comparison 1st gen has issues).
The wireless AirPods were not in the box.  A white air pod box was in the box but wax empty.  I also had cancelled this order as it was too long to wait for it.
I don't recommend these things. Comparing to the ones I got from Costco. The only "advantage" to this one is the Price.

Returned these because they looked like they had been used and honestly look like they were fake. Don‚Äôt know if they were a defect or if someone had swapped them out before I got them. I advise you to buy direct from Apple if you want to avoid this problem.
As everyone may know the AirPods offer underwhelming sound for the money, but they offer one thing convenience.
Son geniales y originales. No tengo ninguna queja con mi compra.
These were not AirPods. The box was Apple air pods but inside were not AirPods. They were dogaye. I bought this for my daughter as a birthday present and was extremely disappointed.

review_title: I don‚Äôt think they‚Äôre worth the price/hype.
product_review: I think i got a defective pair. I had to

My first time using AirPods and with my honest opinion it‚Äôs very convenient but for the price I‚Äôd expect more out of the sound quality. Calling is awesome though I‚Äôd rate it 5-stars just on calling. Same day shipping!!!!!!!

I have been using various wireless & bluetooth products for a while.  I got these yesterday and they are amazing.  They automatically turn on the second you pull them out of the case.  By the time they are in your ear, they are connected to my iphone and are ready to use.  In my iphone, I can configure each ear to do a specific task right in the phone settings without any special software.  I doubletap my left ear and I activate siri and I can doubletap my right ear to play/pause whatever I am listening/watching.  I went on a walk and there was a light breeze.  I called someone on the phone to see how the noise cancellation was and they couldnt hear the wind.  They did hear a car go by but thats to be expected.  I cannot comment on battery life yet, but I can confirm the wireless charging case works with any Qi wireless charging pad.  The pad charges the case and the case charges the earbuds.  This means you can charge your earbuds just by having them in a charged case, no matter where you are.  Really cool.  I also want to mention that if the regular wired earpods fit your ears really good, these will also fit well.  From what I can tell, they are the same size, if not a hair larger but I cannot tell by looking at them.  They dont wiggle around in my ear and they don't feel loose.  I feel like I could easily go on a jog and they'd stay in.

Let‚Äôs be real they are really expensive, But they are  great, does sound good. they stay in your ears I work out with them and they don‚Äôt fall off. This is my second pair I have the first generation and I bought this one after two years of uses every single day because I was having battery problems. I have my first generations ones now for use exclusively exclusively in the shower so I don‚Äôt have a panic attack if it ever falls into the water. There‚Äôs not really a difference between the first and second generation so if you already have it and they work good I wouldn‚Äôt really upgrade.
We ordered these and received "Jakes Earpods" so it appears we received an old used pair.  gross.
[Written on Feb 17, 2020]

I have to stop order high dollar items from here. They‚Äôre usually problematic. These AirPods are no different. They were purchased new. Arrived in the sealed Apple box with another box. No padding of any kind. The Right AirPod crackles. Making it completely unusable for meetings and too annoying for music. I put them in my desk and just avoided them. I used them yesterday for a meeting (because my Beats died) and it‚Äôs just horribly frustrating. The left one works fine. But what‚Äôs the point if I can‚Äôt use them both. This place is great for lightbulbs and laundry detergent. But I really need to forgo the two day shipping and buy these electronic devices from the original supplier.

review_title: Received my brand new headphones used and dirty.
product_review: Received item in opened manufacturer box.  The headphones were dirty and definitely used because they still were called the previous owners name.  They do work for now but have someone else's earwax on them.

Let me start off by saying I do really enjoy these. It's the quality you can imagine from apple so no worries there, I just wish they would get a water proof set already. The noise cancellation isn't magnificent, but definitely average/decent I'd say. Overall I'd buy them again because it really is awesome to have a wireless set up, just be aware these things will eventually fully die after a year or two due to the hardware set up. (you cant replace internal batteries) but I'd still go for it if you want the airpods experience. Yeah sure, eventually water proof and such will be delivered but who knows when. I think these are worth it. I love the wireless charging case too.

I listen to books or music while I am hiking with my dogs and the headphone wires kept getting tangle with my dogs leash and the water bottle carrier that was around my shoulder. It was a big pain to have to keep adjusting everything. So I finally decided to invest in AirPods and am so glad I did. Not having wires hanging and tangling in the leash is such a treat. I was worried that they would fall out when I hike, but they stay in very well. I only use 1 AirPods as I like to have an ear free for safety reason. I bought the wireless charging case because I keep the AirPods in my car on the days I hike M-F and then take them out to charge on the weekend when I am not hiking. These are definitely worth the money. But if you don't need the wireless charging case, it is not necessary and you can save some money.

review_title: One buys these buds for other than full range head banging music.  I use them A LOT!
product_review: These have even more distance from phone range than the previous model. The sound range is somewhere from high bass to high highs.  They are perfect for phone conversations as sound range is more towards voice than music.  Music does sound very clear, they just don't have a lot of bass.  The microphone is really good.  When I used to have conversations with my daughter, she used some sort of headset, not apple, and I often asked her "what?"  I sent her these airpods, and I can hear her perfectly, even when I'm using my airpods at the same time.  My kitchen is about in the middle of a 1700 sq. ft. house, and I usually leave my phone on the island and can walk all around the house without having to carry or pocket the phone, and it seldom breaks up.  I love them.

I am happy purchased them after reviewing products for weeks. Preferred these cuz if they are out of the case you can tone them up and find them, however if they are in the case you can‚Äôt. Battery life has been great for me, 3hrs for ears, 24hrs for case that recharges the ears. Noise canceling isn‚Äôt really a thing with these, I can still hear music in the gym if I have them in and don‚Äôt play music, but when music plays it blocks out noise well. The old apple style head phones used to hurt my ears, and these still do too, but a nifty trick is to put the opposite one in the ear upside down and they are much more comfortable for long term wear, but you can‚Äôt talk in them like that. I got a glow in the dark case with a key ring and I haven‚Äôt lost them since I bought them a couple months ago. I enjoy the wireless charging cuz I have two wireless charging pads in my house.

review_title: Don‚Äôt waste your time & $ You get what you pay for.  Buy the right earbud the 1st time.
product_review: Bought 2 other cheap $50 earbuds trying to save some $. Complete waste of $. Apple is the only way to go. Both $50 earbuds 1 from some knockoff on Amazon. The other a BlackWeb from Walmart. Both were uncomfortable to wear. 2 different styles. 1 silicone twist inside the ear the other a hook over the ear. Both gave me headaches & major ear fatigue. Both cheap $50 earbuds broke after @ a month.
Some folks think that if you're sporting Apple's wireless earbuds, you are just trying to "look cool". While you WILL look awesome with these bad boys, that's not the reason to buy them!

review_title: Received used AirPods with ear wax absolutely disgusting
product_review: I have been a loyal Amazon customer for the past couple of years. My original Apple AirPods were mistakenly washed so I turned to Amazon to purchase a new set of AirPods. I was warned and told to purchase them directly from Apple but I was confident that I would be able to receive them same level of service. Fast forward about a week I received the notification that my AirPods were delivered and I was super excited. As a former Apple employee I would definitely say that I‚Äôm aware of what a fresh pair of AirPods should look like. Upon opening the box I noticed that the box was old and seemed used and didn‚Äôt have the original tight plastic seal. So I opened the box and the AirPod case was severely scratched and I automatically knew that these AirPods were used. I opened the case and noticed reddish ear wax on both AirPod buds which is absolutely disturbing and disgusting. I would‚Äôve  never never a million years that this could happen. If I could give a negative rating I would this has been a horrible experience and I would never recommend that anyone buy small personal electronics from Amazon again.

review_title: Great quality Apple product at Amazon price
product_review: These AirPods are the latest model with wireless charging capabilities, making them the most convenient earbuds on the market, in my opinion. I purchased them to pair with my iPhone 8 and didn't even have to read the instructions, before the two were paired. Now when I open the case, I can see on my phone the battery status of the case as well as the AirPods. Super sleek styling, magnetic seating and closure makes these so slick to replace for charging. Now I want a cover to go around the case! Well worth the purchase, save some money buying from Amazon. My only complaint, no Apple sticker, but I've got others, so I'll be ok.

review_title: The impeccable Apple AirPods pairing feature & audio quality will help your smile.
product_review: Are use mine with an Apple iPhone. These are exceptionally good. I bought some Aha silicon ear hooks. These AirPods 2 using the Aha ear hooks keep them in position & are great. Other reviewers have mentioned improvement of sound, I think the Aha ear hooks do not reduce these AirPods sounds, but I don‚Äôt notice any enhancements either. The Aha hooks do not interfere with functions such as stopping the sounds when removed from your ear. These AHA‚Äôs must be removed for charging. The removal/replacement takes about 5 minutes. These AirPods 2 pair with Siri such that they pause, resume play skip tracks & change volume. When listening to streaming music, currently using Amazon Unlimited, free for 3 months with purchase, I do not need to adjust any of the features referred other than saying 1) ‚ÄúAlexis‚Äù to have features supported by Amazon Music or 2) ‚ÄúHey Siri‚Äù. Uncertain as to selecting playlists, Artists or stations. Some luck so far but these requests have been hit or miss. Perhaps Apple streaming will be more compatible. The battery seems to last 4+ hours. The batteries fully recharge by placing them in their charging case for 15 minutes. These Apple products also allows for making phone calls from your contacts by verbal commands.

review_title: I love them first time, 2nd time return
product_review: I got these for my son and he loves them. I love the comfort of them in the ear. I love apple products in general

review_title: Can't make it through the day on a charge - not a good fit for me
product_review: The product is beautiful, as it should be at this price point. However, the battery life on these makes the product unsuitable for my use. If what you're looking for sounds like me, you may want to think twice.

Is it worth $200 for portability and quick wireless charging sure. Could they have improved on these AirPods tremendously? Absolutely... they really let us all down with this one size fits all crap, my ears start to hurt in about 3-4 hours I guess it‚Äôs good that the battery dies around then huh? I‚Äôm trying out the beats Solo 3 skyline edition and these have got me thinking ü§î

I love my Airpods 2. It automatically connects when you put them on and the sound quality is absolutely amazing. The battery life is crazy long especially with the wirelessly charging case. The double tap feature is extremely easy to work with and if you need anything else you have Siri to help you out. Apple enthusiasts look no further, just grab your pair now because you should have already!

review_title: Such an improvement over gen 1 APs and no comparison to the AP Pros
product_review: These are better in almost every way than the first generation of APs. As a long time user (3.5 years) of the the original APs, I can say that these are even more indispensable. The battery life is longer, they (and the case) charge faster, they are louder and somehow more clear than the originals, they even pair/connect faster and more reliably than my old AP. The wireless charging capability is a nice bonus, and make it that much easier to take em and go.

I‚Äôve held off on Apple‚Äôs ear buds for a while because hard plastic ones always hurt my ears. Ive been wanting some truly wireless earbuds for a while. I was planning on getting a new Apple watch to replace my 1st gen watch that was ready keel over and saw that the watch 5 would support these ear buds. I decided to give it a try. At first my ears ached a little but I made sure that they just rested in my ears versus cramming them in like you have too with silicone ones. I‚Äôve gotten used to them now and they have become a huge part of my day now. I wear them at work listening to audiobooks and music, at home when I‚Äôm doing drawing, crafting, or cleaning the house. Ive only come close to running them dry once at work. Normally, i take a break every couple hours and pop then in their case to charge out of habit. I come from using $30 earbuds for years so the sound quality of these is absolutely mind blowing. And they cancel out noises and distractions very well. Mine were brand new from Amazon directly and in original sealed packaging. So I didn't have the gross issues that another person had with being sold a used product for the price of a new one. Got to watch out for those vendors sometimes. üòï

For the longest time, I didn‚Äôt want to get these because I found that they looked ridiculous and honestly - they really do. However, I do partially get the hype around them as it charges fast, lasts a long time, and the sound quality itself is pretty alright.

SUPER disappointed. Got these for my teenager. Was excited because they were on lighting deal. They‚Äôre not LEGIT REAL apple pods. They advertise wireless which they are not. Legit apple products come in the apple box WITH plastic wrap sealed MINE DID NOT. I‚Äôm furious and my daughter IS heartbroken cuz NOWWWW I need to return these NOT FOR FREE on Monday when I get to work. SUPER disappointed

review_title: There's lot of bugs with android devices connection,  but there's solution:
product_review: I've used the first generation of airpods for more than a year and it worked fine with my Galaxy device.

I love these so much! I love the fact that the case itself charges when you return them. When you lift the lid, it will tell the battery life on your phone of each piece as well as the case. These are super easy to set up on your phone. I love the fact that you can set it up on "Find My Device". My cat decided to knock mine off in the floor and I was able to find them with the beeping/ringing sound it makes when you activate on your phone to find it. It makes it easy to answer calls when you don't have your phone on you, switch songs, as well as using SIRI. It is by far the best earbuds I've owned. I highly recommend.

review_title: Worst Experience with Amazon. I got USED AIRPODS!
product_review: This is the first time I have a really bad experience with Amazon. My wife gave me a present for Father's day, a pair of Airpods 2, since I'm a Apple fan, from the start I notice something weird, the box didn't have the plastic wrap, the airpods case wasn't shinny new, had scratches all over, it looks like a refurbish product but was bought as new (whole price $169).

review_title: Good sound, and convenient to use
product_review: Seeing that this is an Apple product, it was guaranteed that I'd end up buying it just shortly before the next generation product was released... but that's a common hazard, with Apple products... and it's how they get you to keep buying more.
WoW, the sound quality!! I‚Äôve been a skull candy (from Marshall‚Äôs) girl for years, but these are the best I‚Äôve experienced.

Out the box these don‚Äôt feel like there quality. My first pair of AirPods and I would say there worth it as long as you understand your mainly buying into a brand. But if you expect 200$ worth of wireless headphones than this wouldn‚Äôt be the right place. Be wary of these things, they give me headaches and sometimes I will notice a high pitched buzzing noise if I leave them in my ear without playing music.
Best purchase you‚Äôll ever make. I‚Äôll never go back to ‚Äúbroke pods‚Äù again haha (earphone with wires). You don‚Äôt need the noise cancelling ones. These do great job and provide great sound.

Bought these for my wife and she absolutely loves them. She takes them to the gym, to work out around the neighborhood on her runs, and when she's cleaning around the house. Only complaints I hear from her is that sometimes, the headphones will just randomly connect to her iPhone OR only one headphone will connect while the other stays silent. She just disconnects and reconnects them to resolve this issue; apparently it is an issue a lot of people have but work through. Would buy again.

This is my second pair of airpods. The first time around I had them paired with an apple device, needless to say they were flawless. Aside from the fit they were good, I'm no audiophile so the sound quality was great. My second pair I had paired With a Note 9 and after experiencing this you cant truly enjoy them. Many features lack such as in ear detection, the ability to chaged the tap features on the buds and the volume themselves. With my note 9 I would have issues of the volume of the buds lowering. And I don't mean my phone volume, I mean the actual buds volume. I didn't even know that the buds had a separate volume level, do they? To conclusion. If you have anything other than an iPhone then you should look elsewhere.

review_title: Double tap function doesn't work well with youtube
product_review: I love the sound quality and the ease of setting these up. They don't feel like anything in my ears, but are stable enough that I don't have to worry about them falling out if I'm working out! The wireless charging is great and they can be worn one at a time so I can charge one while wearing the other. I can hear what's going on around me while they're on. For me, I love it! There are very inexpensive silicone tips available to aid in noise cancelation, if that's not your thing. Also, when I wear hearing protection (ear plugs) I have to use 2 different sizes, because one ear is larger than the other. These fit both my ears equally well. Extremely comfortable. I can hardly feel I'm wearing them.

review_title: They know what they are doing
product_review: After looking at numerous "truly wireless" headphones, reading the reviews, and in a total state of confusion, I finally went with the Apple AirPods for a few reasons. First, they were on sale on Amazon. Second, they had much better overall reviews. Third, I have never really had any problems out of Apple products.
My fianc√© got this for my birthday and it is a real 2s gen.

review_title: Do no buy these from here.
product_review: After just two months my left ear bud stopped working.  I find out that they are probably refurbished and not new.  After spending an hour on the phone with amazon customer support and apple support I have to go into the store to possibly get a new pair of REFURBISHED pods.  It is DISGUSTING that you pay full price and after 2 months all you get are a used pair.  I stayed away from APPLE for years and just recently went with them with a XS max phone.  I wish i had just stayed with my android.  APPLE is a big company who does not care about you or your hard earned money.  Amazon is disappointed that the description does not even say refurbished.

Every once in a while you get a product that just does not work like it is suppose to work. This was, if you will excuse the pun...a bad APPLE. I went to the return place on the initial order and touched on maybe 3 issues  to describe the problem. This was Monday night about 8:45PM. Amazon Prime, in its' infinite striving to be the best in the industry, sent a label for the return and every direction I could possibly need to make this a completely seamless transaction. This was a Gift for our Granddaughters 13th Birthday and I felt terrible that it didi not work, but in less than 12 hours a box with Brand New AirPods was on my porch . When I picked up my granddaughter from school and the box with her new AirPods was sitting in her seat she smiled so big I think I could hear her happiness. That was more than worth the price. Thank you Amazon for making this brand new teenager so very happy. You're the BEST.

review_title: Should not have waited so long
product_review: I was a hold out on the AirPods, but after my kids each got a pair and told me how much they love them I had to get some. They are well worth the money. Easiest set up ever. Open the case and hold next to the phone and you are set to go. They fit just like the wired apple earbuds, but no wires.  I have also noticed that when I open the Amazon app when I am listening to apple music it temporarily pauses the music on my phone.  I do not have Amazon music so I am not sure if that works with AirPods or not, but I am going to go with what other reviews say and go with NO so if you  listen to Amazon music you will have to make a different choice when using AirPods.  I do have small ears and losing these was a fear of mine, since the regular ear buds fall out, so I did purchase the silicone cover with the ear hook and that was a smart choice.  I have never felt like these will fall out with the silicone.  I also purchased a protective case to keep the wireless charging case from getting scratched.

review_title: Great sound quality on calls, great battery life
product_review: I take calls nearly every day, in a context where exceptional sound quality really matters, and I spend a great deal of time on most calls, so I've tried literally dozens of products for a comfortable, hands-free experience that allows me to focus on the interactions - not stuck dealing with technology.  I've tried the best and the most expensive products around.  Better than almost all *wired* products (but wired is so problematic at times - thus all the experimenting with wireless options).  I spent hundreds of dollars on one popular product (begins with a B), alone.  From the start, I couldn't use that set for calls due to callers' complaints about the sound.  I use it for music and for noise canceling when yard workers are out with their loud equipment, but I don't use it for calls - ever.  My Air pods are by far the best.  Everyone I've asked, and who knows the difference from calling me over the years, agrees.  Oh, also, Google Maps has no problem taking addresses by voice using an Air pod (one piece for driving; it's the law), whereas my tranyas made voice address navigating impossible.  I'd have to unpair them, then use speaker to give Google Maps the address, then pair them (well, it - the one piece while driving) again.  Not with air pods.  They get it right every time.  The air pods are also comfortable for hours , and stay in well with normal use (they're even ok for side sleeping; rarely, one will fall out overnight).

Lo pusieron en mi puerta y le tiraron una foto simulando me lo entregaron y me lo robaron cuando vi la foto en mi tel√©fono abr√≠ mi puerta de una vez xk lo estaba esperando con tanta emoci√≥n , y ya no estaba , espero aparezcan .

review_title: Find a better pair for similar price
product_review: The product needs no explanation, but here is why I did not like it

Loved the AirPods 2 and a definite upgrade from previous Bluetooth earbuds. Really like that they turn on automatically and I can use just one that add the second if needed for better sound quality.  Highly recommend adding the aha plastic cases which allows wireless charging without removing them.
I ordered these, and expect a long time to get them (even with prime)

review_title: No volume control on the AirPods....must use device control
product_review: The one MAJOR drawback is that there is no volume control on the pods themselves.....you must use your mobile device to adjust volume which seems pretty ridiculous. You can set things up so that you can pause play with a double tap on either the right or left pod, but still no volume control.
Much improved from original version.  Connects faster.  Not sure if it sounds any better the before.

review_title: Great audio quality from a name you know
product_review: One of the things I've always liked about the Apple earbuds is that they deliver pretty decent low end frequencies.  A lot of the other branded earbuds didn't really seem to satisfy this request.  I listen to all kinds of music - alternative, metal, rap, country, and even classical.  Having earbuds that provide a fuller range are a necessity.  The wired ones fit the bill there - so how well do the wireless ones hold up?  Excellently.  I've not really heard any degradation of audio going to the Airpods.

review_title: Ok.  I decided to try these.
product_review: Originally I was going to avoid these. I avoid first releases as they tend to have problems. It also seemed like Apple was simply trying to avoid paying for the right to use the connection. Main reason; it seemed they could be lost really easy.

review_title: I finally decided to treat myself for my birthday
product_review: I always thought that these were too expensive and I couldn't justify spending that much money on earbuds.  I have used the wired version in the past when they come with a new phone but that seems like a thing of the past.  I have a pair of Soundcore wireless earbuds with charging case that I spent $100 on and they are very nice and comparable to the Apple version.  However, the problem with the Soundcore earbuds is that they are very sensitive and the slightest adjustment in your ear causes them to skip songs or pause songs etc.  They also use those rubber end caps that never really seem to sit quite right in my ear and if I'm moving around they tend to fall out.  The Apple airpods fit perfectly and stay put in my ear without me worrying if they are going to fall out.  I'm glad I spent the money and wish I had done it a long time ago!

These are Gen 2 Air Pods in a wireless charging capable case just as they are being represented. I ran the model numbers from the sealed package from Apple thru the Apple.com support site and they are Gen 2. Ordered at 4PM and they were delivered before 8AM the next day. They perform just as all the reviews say they do - excellent in my opinion. I don't like the ear-insertion tips of the Air Pod Pro model so these are excellent for me. They pair instantly with an iPhone which also automatically pairs them with all other Apple devices in your iCloud account. I also paired them with my Windows based HP PC. Had to turn bluetooth off and back on, on the PC and have my iPhone off to get them to pair but they did and the sound  quality with YouTube and other programs is perfect. I will by the aftermarket wireless charger shown on the Amazon page with these. Apple's price is ridiculous  Even these were cheaper thru Amazon than direct from Apple.

review_title: Apple got me to drop $150 for headphones and I don't regret it
product_review: So I was against these from day 1.  Why would I spend 150+ dollars for a pair of headphones that seem to be the same as the free ones that come with my phone. Plus apple removed the hedphone jack which is about the most lowball thing they could do.  But after spending a few days with these, I see why everyone got them.  They know when they are in or out of your ear and turn on and off.  The wireless changing case always is amazing.  I don't have to make sure I have a powerbank or cords with me.  It will just charge, the sound is great and speaking is clear. Overall I would recommend. The battery life is about 5 hours but just 15min of charging adds on a few hours.  So charges fast.  I am still angry at the headphone jack though.  -100 stars to apple for that!

review_title: What‚Äôs not to like about these? They are speedy but great
product_review: I‚Äôve had my eye on Apple AirPods for some time but could not justify the price. Have had two other knock off earbuds but when they were new they seemed fine but after six months both were dead.

These were fantastic - for the first fifteen minutes. Shortly into use, the left pod stopped working. I assumed they were dead, so I placed them on my charging pad to charge. After about an hour, I removed them from the case and tried to use them again. The left one was still unresponsive. Following some tips from the Apple website, I attempted to reset them, but this seems to have screwed up the entire system. Now, they only show a blinking white light and will not pair with any of my devices, Apple or otherwise. I know these are legitimate AirPods because, after reading some reviews, I did a deep dive into the Internet to see if maybe they were fake, but I confirmed that these were indeed the real deal. They sounded great and were so user friendly right up until they stopped working, so I‚Äôm going to try again. Just in case, though, I am going to pay the extra $15 and buy them directly from the Apple website. I have since returned these defective earphones.

review_title: Easy to lose and no trade in for the pro-version
product_review: Bought these September 30, lost the left one within 2 weeks, paid $75ish direct to Apple to get a new left one, and Apple announced the Pro version a few days later.  The Reviews on the pro version indicate a better ear fit that would reduce my chances of losing another one and indicate a better sound quality. The generation 2 that I bought are fine in general,  but I am frustrated how easy they are to lose / fall out. I am also frustrated that Apple does not have an trade in type program to allow me to pay Apple even more to get the pro version, but to not have to spend another $250 this month on top of the $250 that I spent last month ($175ish for the gen 2 + $75 for the left replacement within 2 weeks). I also have an annoying pair of wireless beats headphones I bought from Apple a couple years ago. My take away for this review... don‚Äôt trust that since it is Apple it must be good / they will work with you and please shop smarter than I have.

I was converted to Apple products in 2010 and have found over the years that their product just work. No matter the application or device. You can expect all the same with these AirPods. Wish they figured out volume control without grabbing phone, tablet or laptop to make the adjustment. Fit leaves room for improvement so if you have hard to fit ear canals spend the extra money on the AirPod Pro model that just came out. I'm kicking myself for buying these not realizing they were going to launch the Pro model this month. GRrrrrr!! Another issue I don't like is they block sound from the room I'm in so if someone tries to talk to you it is difficult to hear them. I guess that is good if you don't want to hear them! LOL At the end of the day I would recommend these for the budget conscience buyer who can't justify the Pro version. They easily pair to all my devices and the voice quality on calls is terrific as well. There are other features to discover as you get familiar using them. I'll let you discover them for yourself!

I've wanted Apple AirPods for some time now, and I finally decided to pull the trigger. Overall, I've been pleased with the experience. The best part of these headphones are that they are wireless and it's really nice to talk on the phone without having to carry the phone with you. I do have a few gripes though that have made it almost more of a pain than it has been a godsend. The first is that the battery life isn't great. The second is that it has a habit of connecting and disconnecting often which can be a real pain when trying to talk to someone and it changes from phone, to AirPods, to speaker, etc. Sometimes this issue occurs when taking out an ear piece and then reinserting it. It does not always reconnect. The final issue is that the plastic of the case itself is surprisingly not good. It scratches so easily. This I was surprised about since Apple prides itself with its quality. I was disappointed with the quality of the case.
Update:
It won‚Äôt work or pair with any iPhone in our house.

Pairs perfectly well with an iPhone 6S. I use them with silicone in-ear hooks. Battery life is not exceptional by any means, though they are adequate enough. The only real annoyance I have issue with, is that from time to time I somehow seem to activate music playing when I least want it to play. Beyond that, they are a fairly good pair of Bluetooth earphones.
Maybe it‚Äôs me but they fall out of my ears with any type of activity.

Perfect, yes they are real airpods, and yes they worked great.  My wife and I are both going to school and have to listen to lectures on our iPhones.  These synced fine and worked exactly as expected from airpods.  Got the wireless charging case as well.  Check camelcamelcamel for the best price (not trying to advertise this site...but you definitely need to look up reviews on that).  The price over the past year it has fluctuated quite a bit and we happend to pick them up at an alltime low price.  GREAT DEAL!

review_title: Great buy if you‚Äôre in the Apple Eco-System, the wireless experience is a game changer
product_review: They‚Äôve been great and an absolute game changer when it comes to listening to music. I can never see myself going back to wired earbuds!
Apple knocks it out of the park again, great upgrade over original

review_title: Okay, but for the price it could be better
product_review: The best I can say is meh.  They are headphones.  They don‚Äôt sound any different than the ones that has the cord that comes with apple devices.  They are easy to pair and the battery is okay.  I am using it as backup headphones.  My bone conduction headphones work better then these for $50 less.  If you are looking for a good pair of headphones these will work.  There are just cheaper options that work just as well.

review_title: Great for apple users, if they fit in your ears!
product_review: When AirPods came out, I frankly found the product silly. I've been a long time user of over-ear noise canceling headphones and never really appreciated the idea of fully free earphones. For the last couple of years, I've been using Sony's top of the line 1000x's and although they have build issues, they sound very good. However, I bought the AirPods about a month ago mostly because I needed a headphone for the sweaty summer months that basically make using over-ears a living hell. Despite the weather getting colder, I'm still mainly using them. Here's why...

review_title: Great Apple quality and sleek look
product_review: I got these earphones for my wife for her birthday after receiving a pair myself. Great quality and sleek look. I didnt think they would stay in my ear as well as they do (as I often have issues with other earphones), but never fall out. In addition, the sound quality is surprising good. I wouldnt say its the best in the market, but its definitely up there. In addition, it is very easy to link up to your device and does not have any lag.

review_title: Nice product, but watch the details
product_review: The product is of good quality. But I was under the impression that the wireless charging case will charge on any qi compatible charging stand. However, when I tried to charge the case on the qi charging station that I ordered from Amazon, it appears not to work. So maybe it only works with Apple qi charging stations? If that is the case the description should say so before buying the product.

I've been an AirPods user since they first came out, and my biggest complaint was the battery life. They just didn't last very long. I found myself having to stop listening to music for a few minutes or switch to another set of headphones while they recharged. That has not been an issue with these! The battery life is much improved. Also, the Bluetooth connectivity has been improved so that switching between devices is much faster.

Like all things Apple, these have made my life easier. No more walking with my phone plugged in and having the ear pods come out when I turn my head or the cord gets caught in my purse. I was worried they wouldn‚Äôt stay in my ears, but they do.  I have trouble with my left ear staying in on the corded ones, so I am happy I don‚Äôt have the same problem with the AirPods. They give me freedom to talk without interrupting me if I‚Äôm cooking, baking or cleaning. They work well with my iMac, so I can take my Spanish lessons with my tutor over Skype and he hears me much clearer than when I didn‚Äôt use them.  The sound quality isn‚Äôt consistent with all Bluetooth devices, but they work with Apple. Sound is a little more muffled that wired, but being cord free is worth the sacrifice.

The sound quality is good for such small devices. The battery life on these are awesome. If you happen to run low, toss them in the charging case for five or ten minutes and you are good to go. I love that they charge so fast!! You can even charge one while you are wearing one if you don‚Äôt want to miss that streaming show you are watching. I had the original AirPods for two years with no complaints, but these seem even better battery wise and sound wise. Not to mention it is nice to have the choice of charging wirelessly or with the connector.

Apple AirPods have been a game changer for work. It is so convenient which cleaning or cooking so I don‚Äôt have to blare the music to cover up the noise on a speaker. I also work an office job, so it is great being able to file, make copies and perform other duties without having to carry my phone with me or working around wired headphones. The battery life for the technology is pretty great. I do chose to alternate earbuds in order to extend the battery usage throughout the day since they will not make it for a full 8 hour shift.

The AirPods are good. They are very convenient. They are great for wearing around the office, and they are also great for college students. But they don‚Äôt have the greatest sound quality, and they do you not do a good job of noise canceling. I also have Powerbeats and the sound quality is far better on the Powerbeats than the AirPods. I did purchase the wirelessly charging case, so it is super convenient to charge the AirPods. One thing that is pretty great about AirPods is that the case that you carry them in also charges them. So even though you only have a five hour charge for a full charge on the AirPods, you still have a 24 hour charge left on your charging case if it‚Äôs fully charged. So you are going to have plenty of charge. Overall, if you‚Äôre looking for great sound quality or something to use while you‚Äôre Running or exercising then I would consider looking at other options. But if you just want something casual to just walk around or wear around the office, the AirPods are a good way to go because they are not very showy and they‚Äôre super easy to carry around.

I‚Äôm literally so disappointed with Amazon. I ordered this for as birthday gift for myself . When I received  the package I was very excited to open it. I‚Äôve been saving money for a while to get this. Imagining opening it and finding everything but the actual airpods. I was really Frustrated and angry. I can‚Äôt say that someone stole it because the package was actually sealed and I can‚Äôt say that it was opened by someone without my permission I was the one who actually opened and received the package. So I know for fact that it was a problem with Amazon. When I contacted them, they said they can‚Äôt do anything and I have to make a police report. I don‚Äôt even know how to do it and I don‚Äôt even want to deal with this whole thing I let it be because I have no prove and I wish I recorded when I opened the package  . Amazon  A-Z Guarantee did not even help and it‚Äôs there for no reason. I‚Äôm extremely angry that I lost my money and I can‚Äôt even do anything about it.

When airpods first came out I thought they looked so ridiculous ( I guess they still kinda do). Then my husband bought a pair and I borrowed them. I fell in love. I like listening to audiobooks while I meal prep and with these I can listen to my book while my husband watches tv in the living room and we don't hear each other. I love that when you take it out of your ear it pauses. It's also nice to have it read your text messages. I'm now an airpod believer. However, they don't have a good fit in my ear and I dropped one in the toilet and flushed it. I can't live without them though so I ordered a single replacement.

review_title: I question its genuineness after a year of usage
product_review: I purchased the AirPod like a year ago because it was on a deal at that time($169 compared to $199 in apple). I am a huge apple fan and I have never purchased apple from a third party seller. But since I am a prime member I took a shot that time. It worked very well, came brand new with sealed package and appeared what was expected but now I am having a lot of problem with this product. First the left pod lost some volume and then the right. I have not had any issue with the battery or connectivity yet but one of my friend who purchased his AirPod with me on the same deal says his battery started dying out after few months use. He ended up buying the AirPod pro from the Apple store after that. It has led me to the conclusion that apple‚Äôs genuineness only comes from their genuine apple store. I suggest you to purchase apple products only from apple website or apple store.

review_title: Legit purchase - Its an apple product, so you know what you get.
product_review: Wife loves them, super comfy.  I have the pro's, so if you are contemplating these w/ the pros, I can tell you that the pro's aren't ideal for wearing over long period of time.  After an hour w/ the pros, my inner ear starts to hurt a little.  These Airpods that I am reviewing stay comfortable due to its design.  The tradeoffs is pro's has noise cancellation, noise ambience and spatial sound (limited music/vid apps that offer this feature).

Oh my god. I would have cut my arm off to get these if I couldn‚Äôt afford them. I use these every day and listen to my audiobooks, so I don‚Äôt have to listen to my coworkers. It‚Äôs nice considering that all I hear is my amazing book when they are trying to ask my about my weekend. Definitely get these, even if your coworkers aren‚Äôt annoying and even if you don‚Äôt have an iPhone! Music, movies, books, podcasts or whatever! These are the best!
Convenient, reliable, wonderful sound quality, siri addition to the AirPod 2s is like having a personal assistant in your head.

review_title: Good but not all they‚Äôre cracked up to be
product_review: My review in a nutshell:

I love that all I did was open them up once out of the box and they were connected. The connection is stronger than all the less expensive earbuds I was constantly buying that cut out and got choppy all the time. I‚Äôve gotten really far from my phone and haven‚Äôt lost the signal. I like that they stop playing the second I remove it from my ear and connect as soon as they are in my ears. The programming of the double tap is also convenient. The only downside is I wish they lasted a full 8 hours on one charge, but I can only use one at a time at my job anyway so I just switch ears. The case lasts through a few charges too. I feel like I spent my money well. Apple is pricey, but always worth it for me.

review_title: Battery life is not what Apple claims
product_review: This is a great product, sound quality fantastic, I especially like the control function by tapping the top of the air pods. I also like the case, you can charge that separately and then charge the air pods in the case as well.  I do not like the battery capacity. Every time I start using them for a run or a walk, batteries start to die, they don‚Äôt last more than 5 hours.

review_title: First gen Airpods, good if you hate wires
product_review: First, these arrived new and connected right to my phone which was a plus. They are literally the regular headphones but without wires. If you turn music up the noise cancels but otherwise no special features. Also for some reason when I go running they fly out my ears, so wouldn‚Äôt recommend for rigorous activities.. if it could just be my ears. And they say they‚Äôre not waterproof but I dropped them in water and put them in rice & they worked soo lol. One last thing, the whole wireless charging case is just the case being charged & you can charge your airpods in that case off the charger.

review_title: Damaged box. Ripped plastic and dirt all over the bottom of the box
product_review: Box was damaged and dirty.  Only complaining because I'm giving it as a gift and it looks tacky but no time to return the item and order a new one. Not sure how the item works because its not for me.

review_title: Good sound, interfaces easily with iPhone
product_review: I bought this for my college-age son and he loves it.  I had previously purchased other brands for him and they did not interface well with his iPhone.  No problem with that here, obviously.  Also the first wireless ones he's had, which was key.  He uses it every day to make phone calls and listen to music as he works out.  He is very happy with the sound quality.  Battery life is not an issue, he says it recharges quickly.  It will be interesting to see how they hold up.  For this price, I expect not to have to replace them annually.  We will see.

review_title: you can just stick them on a cheap Ikea charging pad and bam like 10 mins charged
product_review: Way better than version 1 and you can just stick them on a cheap Ikea charging pad and bam like 10 mins charged
Wife is very pleased, so I earned one brownie point (one is all you ever get... :-) ).

Love these!!! Been contemplating buying for quite some time and I should have done it sooner! They‚Äôre so easy to set up if you have iPhone or other Apple product. And the battery life is INSANE. The charging case holds charge a long time as well as the pods themselves. Was looking for something good for running. I have a pair of ‚Äònot wireless wireless‚Äô brookstones and they just don‚Äôt stay in my ears.  These true wireless were a bit hard to adjust to without the volume adjust on a wire attaching them but I love them so much more. They stay in my ears no matter what! And I‚Äôm a sweaty human! Recommend these to everyone
Cons:
Buyer beware !! I went out of my way to make sure I bought these NEW but when I was setting it up for my iPhone, the description came in as:

I was looking for wireless headphones for the gym and to wear at work as I do construction. I ordered these because they seem like the best choice for an IPhone and everyone I know was saying how they don‚Äôt fall out. But I guess my ears are not normal because as soon as I got on the treadmill they bounced out of my ears onto the treadmill belt and shot across the floor of the gym. How embarrassing and disappointing. They would be fine if I sat on my butt all day doing office work or something but they just don‚Äôt work for my active lifestyle. As for sound quality and battery life those are both good but don‚Äôt expect any noise cancellation. And don‚Äôt expect to buy those add on things that add size to the buds to keep them in the ear because those don‚Äôt fit in the case. Pretty disappointed in these but I should have known better
Enjoy the freedom and easy!  Can become a bit addictive that keeps me from enjoying the  natural auditory life around me.  Be careful.

review_title: Very nice. Buy a case though
product_review: These things are great for the average music listener. As a college student, these are a good investment, and will greatly help you out. I do not listen to music through headphones very often. But when I do, say after a class on the way to my car, they are great little headphones. I rarely have to charge them, maybe once or twice a week. Speaking of charging, the wireless charging feature with this model is awesome. Just set it down in the pad and it starts to charge! However, the one con with these headphones is the glossy white plastic they used. If you are OCD as I am, you are going to be annoyed at how easily the plastic scratches and scuffs. A cheap rubber case with a carabiner  is a good investment to help protect the case, while also covering the already present scratches. The best thing about these headphones is the W1 chip also preset in the Beats X wireless headphones. For iPhone users, this makes pairing and connecting effortless.

I bought these for my teen. He LOVES them! The sound quality is great and being cordless is so convenient as it keeps his hands free for all the other  stuff kids have to carry around at school. The cordless charging case is awesome because it charges his AirPods while he‚Äôs not using them,  without having to look for a source of electricity while out and about. Cool how the case magnetically ‚Äú catches‚Äù the pods. You wouldn‚Äôt think little things like that matter but it helps get them in the case all the way without pushing them down - to be sure they charge.

review_title: Secure fit, beautiful sound, EZ pairing!
product_review: My first set of AirPods and I'm super happy!  Fit is secure. Sound is crystal clear. EZ-PZ pairing with all Apple & Mac devices. Wish it didn't have such a high price tag.  I've purchased other brand, cheaper AirPods for other family members, and have returned them all.  The fit is not the same, nor sound quality.  You get what you pay for.

Purchased for my husband for Father‚Äôs Day. He uses them daily. He owns his own business and is constantly taking calls. He has had several ear pieces and he says this is by far his favorite. Noise cancellation is top notch. He has them connected at least 10 hrs a day usually more and the battery life is excellent.

Amazing.  These buds are super practical for almost every activity and have instantly replaced my Bluetooth headset for handsfree usage. The sound has the quality I expect from Apple. Running on a treadmill to simply moving around , no more wires getting tangled up and they sit comfortably. Options to use either one or both , the charging case ... they are all winning features for me.
Right out of the box I had my phone nearby and opened the Airpods charging case. I didn‚Äôt even get the paperwork out yet to know what would happen. My phone immediately asked me to connect to them.

review_title: Loud sub bass pop in voices and constant amplifier hiss
product_review: I have hearing a little different than most people I guess.  There is a old school transistor like hiss even when listening to nothing.  The hiss is something I have not heard since most new devices have mosfet based systems.  When listening to youtube videos or any video that someone talks directly into a mic the airpods produce a loud "pop" of very low frequency.  Think of listening to talk radio on a 12" sub woofer.  The audio is clear but not refined enough for the huge price tag.  It's also a pain to get the airpods out of the case.

After having my air pods for almost a year, my husband wanted a pair of his own for work (finish carpenter). He loves them because they cancel out all the loud noises at work and the sound quality it excellent! I use mine while working out on my stationary bike and they are perfect! The charging case is great because it charges fast and prevents constantly charging into a usb. Battery life is long as well. Some complain apple products are too pricey, but you get what you pay for and these are definitely a quality product! No regrets!

review_title: So happy with them! Get the warranty too!
product_review: I took a leap of faith with purchasing these and I love them. A day after they arrived (which was about a week), I purchased the Apple Care through Apple‚Äôs official website. First they had to verify my purchase which was NOT. A hassle at all, and I bought the Apple Care for $29 which is a great deal! For just under $30 bucks for a warranty of 2 years, why not? I‚Äôm so happy with my purchase, both the AirPods and the Apple Care! (:

review_title: be careful - i got unopened new ones, my roommate‚Äôs box wasn‚Äôt sealed and was empty
product_review: extremely satisfied with this product! ordered yesterday morning and arrived this afternoon. was very skeptical as my roommate ordered the same ones and received a box without the plastic wrap and there were no airpods inside. i have read similar reviews and other reviews of people getting used airpods, but my box had plastic wrap and is brand new and, sure enough, there were also brand new airpods inside! very pleased and grateful. the sound quality is so good! would 100% recommend these but be cautious as obviously orders of this product have not gone so well for other people.

I really liked these.  They are small and convenient.  I have never been able to wear in-ear earbuds but was hopeful these would work for me.  Unfortunately, they didn't fit my ears and caused my ears were in pain while wearing them.  Amazon was very good about letting me return them.  If you get these as a 'refurbished' just know they were only worn for a few hours and they are in perfect condition.  I did not want to give them up.  I wish Apple would make bone conducting because that's what I can comfortably use.
I accidentally sent my AirPods v1 through the washing machine and dryer.  /sad.  I bought a pair of Sony Bluetooth ear phones, and they were terrible.  So, I bought the AirPods v2.

I just got some pods for the first time. They are brand new and I tried resetting them first I couldn‚Äôt do it so I call customer service and they helped me and it started to work but as soon as o hung up one of the pods went out and stopped working. I Didn‚Äôt even get to enjoy them within 24hours. And I always wanted a pair now that I got a pair today for the first time then I end up finding out that one of them don‚Äôt work really mad me upset and sad that I spent my money on a product that‚Äôs messing up like this

Had to buy some ear hooks, but with them, these pods fit comfortably and securely, for running or any other vigorous activity.  Sound is good.  Big plus is the great compatibility with my I-phone.  Got lots of ear buds; these are the best.  Wish the life of the pods out of the case was a bit better, as I wear one most of the day for occasional listening to book and answering and making calls.  I get about 5 hours before they need to go back into the case.

I am not an Apple fan but my daughter wanted these for Christmas.  They worked fine for 3 months but then the left pod stopped working.  Apple replaced it since it was under warranty but the replacement doesn't work either.  Now neither pod will be recognized by her phone and she can't use them at all.  Tried contacting Apple support but have been waiting more than a day for a response.  There goes my money down the drain (again).  Thanks for nothing Apple!

¬†This  apple air-bud is the best!! I have own more than eight air-bud, trust into you used the apple air bud, u have been missing out. Once you go apple air-bud no will be no going back to any others period. As you can see in the pic,  there is only one in the case because I lost one of them, and the best part with that you can still use the other  one, unlike other one buds. I did purchase the air pad pro, no comparison, when it comes to clarity.

I like that they don't seal my ear. I gave 3 stars on noise cancellation because they don't block noise. But for me, this is the main reason I bought them. I don't want to feel like I am under water, I want to hear the things around me while listening to my books. Everything else is great. The size. The connection to my iPhone. I wish they'd last longer than 2-1/2 years before the batteries only hold 20-30 minutes of charge. I'll always buy them if I have an Apple iPhone.

review_title: A wonderful product. I‚Äôm so happy
product_review: A wonderful product. I‚Äôm so happy I ordered these on a whim. I was really excited to get them until I read the reviews. I was worried that I would receive someone‚Äôs use AirPods with ear crust all over them and I would just be so unhappy and have to send them back. I‚Äôm so happy to say that that‚Äôs not the case. When I received my AirPods they were completely wrapped With all the necessary paperwork. These are legit. I‚Äôm so happy I took the plunge and even happier that I had a great experience. These are going to be so useful when I‚Äôm traveling

review_title: Lo mejor para un usuario de apple, lo peor para amante del audio
product_review: Son muy buenos pero por alguna raz√≥n se sienten inc√≥modos despu√©s de un rato, en general hacen un buen juego si tienes otros dispositivos apple. Los recomiendo

Overall exactly what I needed. I bought these before the new Pro ones came out but I‚Äôm still happy with these. I knew there were better sounding Bluetooth headphones on the market but I wanted something that would easily connect to my phone and watch. It does the job! I haven‚Äôt had any issues with them connecting to my phone, they even connect to my yoga 900 laptop but that threw them off a little to connect back to other things so I use them primarily for Apple products for ease.

I've been searching for a decent set of headphones for a while, but didn't want to shell out the money. After trying a few different types, I finally bit the bullet and ordered the AirPods and soon wished I'd done it sooner. They were so nice that I bought my mother a pair for Christmas. She's not very tech savvy and finds them very easy to use. I wear one headphone at work at a time and listen to podcasts during the day. I usually get about 4-5 hours on a charge. The case seems to hold enough juice to charge the Pods quite a few times. I only end up having to charge the case once a week and use the pods 8 hours a day, 5 days a week. Plus a little here and there when talking on the phone and driving.

These things have absolutely changed my life. I work in a call center and have never been able to listen to music while working because the ear buds would make it difficult to hear the caller. NO MORE! I'm not sure if it's active pass through or passive but I am able to carry on conversations with people in the office and of course over the phone with absolutely no issues at reasonable music volumes. I wear these for 10 hours a day on work days with an on ear headset and have no issues with discomfort. They last about 6 hours without charging with volume at about 20% so as long as I put them in the case for 5 or 10 minutes during breaks I they never die while I'm working.

I had first generation AirPods from the beginning but always had trouble with one or the other not connecting or going to use them and finding one dead and not charging. I finally got sick of wasting time taking one in and out of the case 20 times trying to get whichever one to charge and eating up all my running time like this so I ordered this new pair. First time worked like a dream, when they work they work great. Second time, today, I opened the fully charged case to find right one charged 100% and the left one at 1%, and it‚Äôs exactly what was happening with my old pair. I am beyond frustrated and have now lost my run time today starting and restarting and pulling the left one in and out until it would charge. Still waiting for the p r to charge. This is beyond frustrating and disappointing, Apple should do better!

review_title: By the new ones with the rubber earbuds so they fit better in your ear so they don‚Äôt fall out.
product_review: Great product but if you jog or move around bumping a lot they will fall out of your ears. Better to get the updated version that has the new rubber tips on them which they have three different sizes large medium and small pay a little more but a better product. Would've been the way I went. And I just bought him three months before some a little little sour about it but they are a great product. If you‚Äôre active you should definitely get the ones the new ones if you‚Äôre real mellow done don‚Äôt worry about they will stay in your ear.

Very fast shipping.  Thus far, my son is very happy with the product itself; however, it's been only one day that he's had them.  Today is Sat., 18 Jul 2020.  It's been about 60 days since my son received the AirPods.  While he was excited when he first got them, he's no longer excited.  He's not pleased anymore.  Within the past month, the left ear dies much faster than the right.  Also, he's not able to hear in them as clearly as he did when he first received them.  Unfortunately, we've missed the window to return them.  Now, I'm forced to use the warranty.  No telling what's next....

Guys, pls start checking your AirPods for Serial# and model# !!!!  I bought three of these airpod in July 2019. I picked one for my own and others for my parents. I first belived it came direct from apple store, so I ignored every small details that tells me these are not new AirPods. My left airpod is very hard to do two-tap register in first week. I tolerated. And around Jan 2020, it stopped two-tap completely. So I checked the model#. The case is generation2 early edition, left ear is A2031 and right ear is A2032?! My iPhone tells me it's A2031. So it is definitely a A2031 set paired with a A2032 right earplug. No where to fix or return but to purchase a replacement from apple. So, the decision is yours.

First pair I ordered had technical issues (wouldn‚Äôt auto connect, wouldn‚Äôt continue music after putting earbud back in, randomly disconnecting, etc), so I ordered a replacement (quick delivery, thank you!), however the left earbud is significantly more quiet than the right. Because I‚Äôm an idiot, I thought my hearing was going bad until my spouse used them and said ‚Äúwhoa! Your left earbud is garbage. Hardly any sound is coming out. Didn‚Äôt you just get these?‚Äù Soooo.... poop. Not sure what happened. They weren‚Äôt dropped... no damage to either yet technical issues. I was hoping I could get a replacement for the left earbud, but it‚Äôs not allowing me to get another. I guess it‚Äôs a one replacement type of deal. Understandable, but I would have liked a working pair.

I am happy with the AirPods. They are light in the ear; I went to put the right one in the left ear by mistake, but the left one was already in. I like that I don't drag my phone off the desk when I get up. The charge may last for only 3 hours or so, but the case will charge them completely in 15 minutes; and if you charge one at a time, you still have listening pleasure. The sound is great. I realized I couldn't turn them up manually, but if you ask, Siri will do it for you. I like that the serial number is under the lid, I guess if I lose them. I even bought a cover for fun and strap to use while exercising.

I got the AirPod  on September 4th. It‚Äôs was pretty good the whole time. Everything runs well. Normally I use it for listen music and watch movie. I never use the microphone function. A month later after purchase. One day I forget to take it off from my ear and I wear out to the street. I found out the AirPod mic was broken when I received a phone call. For the past day nobody can hear me on phone calls.  I‚Äôve google search for the reason or maybe I paired incorrectly.  I‚Äôve try all the way that apple support have taught me but It still didn‚Äôt work. Don‚Äôt know if these are refurbished AirPod. I‚Äôve scheduled an appointment to apple store to see if they can fix it or change a new one for me.

review_title: Great for my purse! Great companion for everyday use at work and for running errands!
product_review: I opted for these instead of the pros since these are my ‚Äúpurse headphones‚Äù. I mainly keep one earbud in my ear while working, listening to podcasts/videos. The battery life isn‚Äôt amazing, but that‚Äôs what‚Äôs so great about the charging case. When one bud dies after five hours of continuous use, I just switch out for the opposite bud. The case charges quickly and I‚Äôm able to get a full day of work in as well as running errands without distraction. They are slim and less noticeable than other wireless earbuds, so for the price, I‚Äôll take theIr stealthy appearance and their ability to connect to my other Apple products seamlessly. I also am impressed with the fit and how well they sound, compared to in ear buds I have owned in the past. I enjoyed the feel of the second generation Apple earbuds that have come with the iPhone, so without struggling with wires, I am extremely pleased that I spent the extra 100$ on accessories for my iPhone. I got a cute case for the AirPods, a new phone case, and a wireless charging station for under $60. Worth every penny. I even find myself using them frequently at home, especially while I‚Äôm cooking or playing on my computer. I keep one ear bud out to hear my partner or my surroundings while still listening to music or videos. I recommend these for your bag, especially if you don‚Äôt wish to carry your nice over the ear noise canceling headphones, like I do for everyday use in public/at work.

This product worked for 2 months before it started chipping out. THEN it just completely stopped functioning whenever I had calls or tried to talk to Siri. On top of that Apple says I don‚Äôt have a 2 year warranty which I paid for. I‚Äôm going to see about getting a refund ASAP. I‚Äôll got to the actual apple store and spend the money.

I've lost my AirPods which I love. I know there is a 2nd generation with active sound isolation. But I don't really like to be totally isolated and paying extra $100 for that.  I like the unique design and the sound is just good for me.  They fit my ears really well. I can have it on when I work out.  I did pay $20 for the wireless version because I have a wireless charging pad already.  So far, it has been working fine for me.  Fits my backpack and pocket too.

My boyfriend has a pair of the first generation AirPods and he loves them. I was pretty jealous so when these new ones came out with the wireless charging I had to hop on it. I am very satisfied with my purchase, and love that I can charge them wirelessly on my charging pad instead of having to find a charging cord that breaks eventually.

review_title: Almost a year later, still my fav.
product_review: Almost a year later and they are still a daily staple. It‚Äôs so nice to have a headset that can seamlessly swap between my phone, iPad, and MacBook as needed. And now, with COVID, if I‚Äôm out, I can use Siri for hands free phone use to keep my phone away from germs. Battery life is great to me: the AirPods and the charging case. And getting the wireless charging case is worth it since I have a wireless charger by my bed. They take NO TIME to charge up and the case will last days or weeks depending on how often I use them. Sure, I‚Äôd love the Pros, but these do just fine - especially if you can‚Äôt splurge that much. I really don‚Äôt struggle with them falling out of my ears or getting uncomfortable. In fact, I‚Äôll forget I have them in sometimes. I strongly suggest getting a case so you can attach them somewhere. I keep them hooked on my wallet, so they are always with me when I need them.

review_title: Horrible experience, whatever you do - don't buy airpods here
product_review: I've owned multiple pairs and am a tech savvy person.  The airpods are faulty and the left only registers about 30% of the time.  Super frustrating.

Shame on Amazon for not letting buyers know that this product is NOT NEW. I ordered a pair thinking I got a deal, but in reality, I got a pair of iPods that did not work. The wireless charger would not charge. The sound quality was really poor. When I talked to Apple support, they informed me that I needed to send them back. They also recommended ... Always buy Apple products from Apple!!! I learned my lesson!! AND I hope Amazon learned their lesson by offering full disclosure of what you will receive.

review_title: Bad investment‚Äî-GO TO APPLE.COM FAKE WARRANTY BREAKS EASILY
product_review: The right ear stopped working In and out about a month ago. It shows it is charged, but it will not play music. We tried hooking it up to my daughter‚Äôs phone and it sometimes hooks up to hers.
