I am not satisfied wit this investment and advise anyone who is looking to purchase anything from this buyer to look elsewhere!!!!
I have NEVER had a lot of success with ear buds but my adult kids all wanted them for Christmas and I got curious.  I‚Äôm a psychologist who does a lot of phone therapy and I decided to get some.

review_title: Fue un regalo para los 15 de mi sobrino
product_review: El producto fue un regalo del tio y de la abuela para mi sobrino Martin. Recib√≠ el paquete en tiempo y forma. Hace un rato lo onsult√© al sobrino para que me dijera que tal le funcionaron y me dijo que estan andando de manera excelente.  √âl mismo fue el que los eligi√≥ en Amazon. Muchas gracias!
I liked that the battery life was so long, and that you can charge them with just the case. They were so much easier to use since there was no wire to untangle when I wanted to listen to music.

One month into buying these and the left one stops working! My left earpiece is now at less than 50% capacity after one month of use. It is almost of no use. I cannot use it by itself unless the volume is maxed. Suspicious that this happened AFTER a month.

I always get nervous ordering Apple products, but I had just had a friend let me borrow these and I knew I had to have them.  I think the wireless charging case, if you listen to music/podcasts/etc. frequently, are worth the extra price.  It's nice to just have one headphone in, while the other one charges.  When you have both headphones in and you take one out of your ear, whatever you are listening to will automatically pause.  I didn't think I would like them as much as I do, but they have come in handy when I am at work and just want to listen to something discreetly, while working on my computer.  If you have had any doubts with purchasing these, don't.  I was just as skeptical and I double-checked serial numbers and everything.  They are the real Apple product and have far exceeded my expectations.

review_title: Be Cautious when Wearing the Airpods
product_review: I am enjoying the AirPods and use them walking, working in the yard and house and when others in my family are sleeping.  However, two complaints:  they are very uncomfortable in my ears after a couple of hours, and why are they white???  I was shoveling snow two weeks ago and one fell out of my ear as I was diligently scraping at some ice on the sidewalk.  Luckily I found it after looking for 15 minutes!!  Couldn‚Äôt they be a neon color?  I‚Äôm sure I‚Äôm not the first or last person that lost an AirPod in the snow.

I have ordered these twice. I had to send back the first set because they didn‚Äôt hold a charge. Now the 2nd set won‚Äôt hold a charge. I have had them for a little longer than a month and the return window has closed. These were supposed to be new, but performance makes me feel I received refurbished ones. I am very disappointed with this purchase and likely won‚Äôt use Amazon for electronics based on this purchase.

review_title: Great if you are an Apple nut, otherwise go with something else
product_review: My son loves them personally I think you are better off with a number of different products but you gotta love the Apple marketing machine.  Personally I would go with the Anker Soundcore Liberty 2 Pro's or the original Samsung Galaxy Buds not the Plus, they are terrible.  I also hear good things about the Jabra 75T or the Sony Wm 100MX3 I think but I have not tried the Jabra or the Sony.

I love my AirPods. I wear them on a daily basis and have held up against some pretty nasty falls. I once dropped them in a puddle and thought for sure all Hope was lost, but nope! They continue to work beautifully. The sound quality is superb and I appreciate being able to hear the world around me with them in. Not noise cancelling by any means, but that is not what I was looking for. Battery life is great with this case. I charge mine once every few days with daily use.

review_title: Defective, lied to by Apple regarding warranty, no resolution.
product_review: Mine had defective batteries in the right airpod from the start. The wireless case would also randomly go from half charged to totally dead, and would then drain both airpods completely dead in the case. I contacted Apple, and they couldn‚Äôt do anything since they had closed all their stores due to COVID-19, but they assured me that once the stores opened up they would make it right. Once they reopened, it was then past the warranty period, and they told me to get lost. This is the purchase that turned me from  continuous iPhone user since they first came out into someone shopping for Android products. Buy something else.
This product is awesome. I was so happy to get this. I love to listen to music üéß

review_title: Totally worth it. Just be prepared to switch for the few times it goes mute.
product_review: I like thst it's wireless however there were times when in the middle of a conversation, it would automatically go mute. And this is only after 5 minutes into the conversation over thr phone. Got nothin to do with the signal or carrier. Never happened b4 until I started using the airpods. All in all, it serves the purpose- but totally much better reception than the cheap immitations out there. Fits in my ears pretty well- better than the wired ones.

review_title: Traded Up to These for my iPhone
product_review: These have great sound and are true Apple product. I guess they were a great price because I see the newest model (December 2020) has a rubber piece at the end that probably holds them in your ear better. I take long walks with them daily and they stay in fine. I would not recommend this model if you were going to exercise with them on as they would quickly fall out. Work great for my purposes.

I LOVE THEM!!!! I got my Airpods this summer (during Prime day) and they are the best thing I've ever purchased. I'm actually mad at myself for not getting them sooner. I had wireless Beats, which were alright for listening to music, but they were way too bulky and didn't take calls the way Airpods do. I'm an Apple person, so I absolutely love how they switch from my phone to my Mac and iPad. If you're considering getting them - DO IT!!! They are absolutely amazing!!!

This is an apple product.  It is solid and works seamlessly.  Of course it is priced higher than others because it is a high-end product.  You don't expect Whole Foods quality from Aldi's produce section, do you?  You get what you pay for.  Bite the bullet and get these wireless earbuds.  They will last you a long time and connecting takes seconds.  They actually drown out the background noise fairly well and battery lasts longer than I thought.

My only drawback is the battery life of the AirPods and not the case. The pods themselves seem to run battery life pretty fast but the case not so much. But charging them is pretty fast. I honestly love them, they fit perfectly in my ears and sound quality is great. But my husband doesn‚Äôt like the way they fit comfortably in his ears, maybe they could come up with some plastic covers for ppl with sensitive skin because hi ears at sensitive to them sometimes but other than that he likes them as well

Absolutely loving this purchase! I was skeptical because I hate the sound quality of Bluetooth headphones, but these sound better than my wired apple headphones. They also stay in my ear perfectly fine. I haven't experienced latency issues. I also use a galaxy s8+.

I bought these to replace a wireless Bose headset. The sound quality is good. The carry/wireless charging case is awesome and super convenient, though I don‚Äôt charge it wirelessly. The small size is perfect for carrying around anywhere. It fits in your pocket or purse, and is not too big to attach to your keys with a separate case. The noise cancellation is good, but not as good as the Bose headset I‚Äôm replacing. The buds stay in pretty well. I love that you can wear just one or both and the sound adjusts itself. I‚Äôm pretty happy with it so far.

review_title: Finally broke dow ad go these
product_review: I opted for these rather than the "Pro's" as I do not like things stuck into my ear canal. I also was not concerned with noise cancellation. I have nice over ear models for that when I travel. These are to help me mainly for online teaching. They are comfy and stay in my ear securely. I like the fact that I can still hear what is going on around me. Very pleased. Super quick shipping.

Thing stopped working after 1 month. I took good care of it, NEVER dropped them, used them twice a week. I don't over charge them. Just decided to die on me for no reason. Save your money!!! Apple is overrated!!

I love these AirPods. The sound is excellent but I would only use them at home . Because if you take them to the gym or jogging and one of them falls out that one could get lost or stolen. But other than that there fantastic.

review_title: Good Quality, Noise Cancellation not the best
product_review: Sound quality is good, noise cancellation is okay for AirPods but not as good as over the head devices.

Very poor designed. Fells off my ears super easily. Very uncomfortabe, I've never had such earbuds. I used to use philips earbuds with embouchure and I thought it was a time to get something new, something wireless.. but these airpods meh.. no I didn't like them. Gave it to my sister, I think I might get a pro version with embouchure.

You can't say anything about this TWS earbuds, it's just airpods , it working about year and it's cool. No pain , no defects, wireless charging is slow as hell and that is only cons (beside there is no black color). I can't describe sound quality ,you need to test by yourself but it's good enough for retired music producer and it's look very nice when u wear it. For other long reviews just open Youtube and type Airpods review.

These airpods worked like a charm for a while, and then one stopped working.  I did every thing Apple, Mac, and the internet voices in general told me to do, but NOTHING works.  Make sure you buy the extended care, because the problem I'm having is VERY common.

I love these earphones! I was so iffy on buying them but I‚Äôm so happy I did. I wear these during work while I work on emails. They cancel our noise and people talking! No joke!!!!!!!!! Plus ordering off of Amazon I literally got them the next day! I love them. I bought a pair for my dad too for Father‚Äôs Day and he loves them! Definitely recommend just spending a little more $$$ & buying the charging case.
I love these, especially when i compare them to other types of bluetooth headsets ove owned,  (plantronics, lg, etc etc.)  connectivity was flawless,

After comparing these to Gen 1, I can say that the sound quality is a little better, and the tap feature does operate better than Gen 1. Apple makes thing simple, which is why I like them and to why I like the AirPods. I like how easy you can connect them, the music pauses after taking one out, and light they are. I also like how you are able to purchase accessories for them, so if you want the isolation feature then you could purchase buds to isolate the sound. However, the only down fall of that option is it doesn‚Äôt let you charge with the buds on. Anyways, in my opinion AirPods have been the better earbuds I have owned.

I absolutely love these AirPods. I‚Äôve tried many devices before - from Dr. Dre‚Äôs Beats to cheap earbuds - but these are my absolute favorite. I‚Äôm not sure what took me so long to make the change.  The sound is clear, it‚Äôs convenient, and portable. I like that my case is rechargeable. My only issue is that sometimes the right AirPod pops out without notice. I‚Äôve had to replace one already. Other thank that, these are a winner for me.

Setup was a dream! Just open the lid next to your phone and it prompts you to connect! I bought them to wear for traveling. You can still hear the pilot come over the speaker to tell you the weather when you‚Äôre 20 minutes away from your destination so they don‚Äôtc completely block the sound. Some may argue that‚Äôsa good thing. It would be nice if they had a little more bass to them but all in all they are a really good set. The best thing is how little I have to charge them. The battery life is outstanding!!!
100 times better connectivity than the 1st generation Airpods, 1000 times better in battery life.

review_title: Great product but too expensive as is the case with most apple products
product_review: Lightweight wireless headphones. Do their job and it‚Äôs seamless to connect. Only problem is they won‚Äôt stay in my ears that well (everyone‚Äôs ear is different) they are def not worth the price. If you have the first AirPods save your money as it is literally the same thing minus wireless charging and hey Siri.

review_title: Apple Does it Again!  LOVE  these AWESOME AirPods with Wireless Charging Case.
product_review: What is there not to LOVE?  Great sound, sleek design and an amazing wireless charger that keeps you going throughout the day.  I'm over the moon with the seamless integration between all my Apple devices including my Apple Watch.  If that wasn't enough, you're able to program your preferences between Left & Right Buds.  My Left bud is set to activate Siri and my Right bud pauses music when tapped. Get ready to rediscover your music collection all over again  .What a joy to purchase a product and have it exceed your expectations.  Apple does it again.  I highly recommend these AIrPods with Wireless Charging Case.

review_title: Small improvements, but great ones nonetheless
product_review: I decided to get this after losing my first-gen AirPods, thinking the wireless charging case would be a nice upgrade and the AirPods Pro hasn‚Äôt seen price cuts steep enough. Connecting them with my iPhone is noticeably faster than my older pods, but pairing them with older devices that rely on older Bluetooth standards is still quite a challenge with spotty first connects, if a bit better. The hinge is now finished in a brushed instead of a mirror finish, which should hold up better against scratches. No surprises in the fit, they fit my ears quite well and stayed inside my ears during runs, although sometimes they feel loose during more vigorous steps. Hey Siri works most of the time, but the sound quality of Siri is now miles better than before. The wireless charging case definitely adds noticeable heft and bulk, although the AirPods are still quite the featherweight, they now just fit more snugly in my jeans‚Äô coin pocket

I have always hated the wired ear buds and don't prefer to use over-the-ear earphones while I'm at work but these are absolutely perfect as no one notices that I'm wearing them and I can take calls hands free while I'm still producing designs or signage and don't have to stop. I mainly use these while I work and they usually last me all day, I will normally only use 1 at a time just in case someone pops into my office I will still be able to hear them as well.

I was on the fence about spending so much for a pair of AirPods in all actuality I thought it was absolutely ridiculous... However I broke down and bought a pair and it is worth every penny I love these things and couldn‚Äôt imagine my day without them now if you‚Äôre holding back because of the cost you won‚Äôt regret spending the money they are the best investment I‚Äôve made in a long time

review_title: Apple Ear Pods with Wireless Charging Case
product_review: I love these ear pods!  The only thing I found frustrating, at first, was that they kept slipping out of my ears.  So I purchased the SOFT CONNECT - by Comply - SOFT FOAM TIPS for Apple Air Pods Gen. 1 & 2.  AND, after reading one of the reviews, purchased the SMALL tips, because I have a small ear canal.  They fit perfectly!  They do not fit inside the case, which is pretty obvious, but they come with a little pouch so you won't lose them.

review_title: Great Products ! Sound quality is Awesome ! Must Check !
product_review: Yes ! Check the pictures, completely original and the best of it kind. Even in an exclusive pink color.

review_title: The best! And I‚Äôve tried the rest.
product_review: I was skeptical about buying these because I feared I was loose one or both in the course of my working day at the tree farm I work at.
Gave these as a birthday gift was told thank you so many times. When I was young I received a Sony Walkman and the Discman. I treasured them and the music came alive forever. Time to pay it forward.

I was not in the market for earphones, but with all the video conferencing I‚Äôve been doing lately, I decided to cut the cord and get with the times. Everything was what was expected being that they were made by Apple. Add the fact these were $30 cheaper than stores, made this purchase a no brainer.

My brother came home with a pair of airpods, and I tried them out. I had no idea the amount of things you could do with them. I genuinely thought they were just wireless earphones. The music pauses when you take an earbud out, you can an earbud twice and it'll skip to the next song. You can use Siri as well. The battery life is also very impressive! Not to mention the wireless charging case.

Not sure what is happening but we verified ours and it is brand new/ not fake airpods. So, I guess there is a chance the warehouse or shippers are swiping up their old used items with the customers new items... Not sure .. We got lucky I guess. Ours was brand new and works flawless. So glad we choose to buy it.

review_title: not worth the price, especially considering battery life
product_review: Don't think they're worth the money, since you can get others for a quarter of the price.

I got this Airpods last year, I had to return the ones I got by Amazon because one of them was not woking well but I bought them again at the Apple Store, that's the reason I'm givin this product 4 stars. Until now I feel they work perfect, I love them when I am walking or working out. Also I like they have no completely noise cancellation because it's safer when you're biking or running  in a transited street, in that way you're able to listen the cars around.

review_title: Only one side will work after 6 months
product_review: At first I loved my AirPods. In fact I loved them so much I even broke down and bought a second pair after flushing my first down the toilet-case  and all!  But after a few months only the right one will work consistently. I‚Äôve unpaired and paired them more times than I can count. Sometimes that will make both work again, but only for one use. I‚Äôve cleaned them. I‚Äôve checked connections and both are charging. For how much I paid I was hoping they would work longer than a few months.

I replaced my Galaxy Buds with these after being annoyed by the fit, which I found uncomfortable. My AirPods have since been incredibly comfortable to wear. AirPods have been incredibly convenient. They are easy to pair, simple to move between multiple devices (especially between various Apple devices) and have great sound quality. The battery generally gets me through a week before needing a charge on my usage, although if I have a high-use day, they may only last me two days. It would be nice if they could work better with Android phones and Windows laptops, but they are still great earbuds for these devices. Highly recommend!

review_title: At first I didn‚Äôt understand the hype...
product_review: For a long time I refused to switch to Apple products because they‚Äôre expensive as heck. I finally caved in after I basically received an iPhone 8 Plus for free and can upgrade anytime. I must say these are nicer than I thought! Sound is crisp and clear, they connected automatically with my iPhone. Definitely happy with my purchase even though it is a bit pricey üòä

I was worried that they would be fake but I got real Apple Airpods. The sound quality is good but sometimes, when connected to my Chromebook, there are gaps in the audio. Keep in mind that Airpods are not meant to cancel noise. That is a new feature only in the pro model.  I wear these everywhere. The one-step connection process is very simple and convenient.  I wear these for multiple hours each day and they have great battery life.

These things are great.  They sync seamlessly and work great with all my apple devices.  Definitely get applecare though. If you have have issues, as I did, navigate to check overage.apple.com. Enter your serial number and if you get an error that Apple can't confirm the purchase date, you can change it manually there.  Once you do that, getting applecare is easy.

review_title: Not worth the $$$...without a silicone tip mod.
product_review: PROS: Sleek, solid, confortable and very easy to use.

Great sound with great clarity.  So small you really don't even know they are there.  They can stay in your ear for extended periods of time and never be noticed.  Truly the best.  The wireless charging case is nice as well.
Well great gift I purchased for my wife and she enjoys them.

Absolutely the worst Apple purchase is through Amazon Apple store. I received them and the left AirPod had an issue. I decided to go to an apple store and they said they could replace the bad pod but since I purchased it on Amazon I could not get it replaced.  WTF!!!!  They said return it to Amazon which I just found out is not available until January 27th!!!!!!  üò°üò°üò°üò°üò°. I love Amazon but will not purchase apple devices on it again.  Horable

I‚Äôm in love with my ear pods. If I still need to hear things, I wear one, if not I wear both pods. The battery life is longer than I had expected. The case is even longer. Great value as regular earphones were always breaking after a short time of use. I got really tired of constantly ordering more so decided on a really good pair.

review_title: Don't stay in my ear 2 can't really use them!
product_review: When I bought these Buds, I wanted the best - but one week after I purchased them, a newer version came out with better adaptability to stay in your ear.  I waited too long to try to return and exchange!  That is the problem with modern technology - you can buy it one day and blink your eyes and a newer version is out!!  I wish I could exchange the, but it is just too late - they fall on the floor all the time!

I absolutely adore my AirPods. I'm a little apprehensive for its long-term performance after reading reviews of the older model but I'm hoping Apple fixed those issues with this model. Definitely get them from Amazon instead of Apple; it's $20 cheaper and that Prime shipping rocks! I received mine today and the quality is beautiful. They're so comfortable. I will post an updated review as I have them longer, but as of right now I love love love them.

Connectivity with my iPhone X is spotty, I have to make multiple attempts to connect.  While making phone calls outside a slight breeze makes it inaudible for the person on the other end.....forget about running or biking while taking a call.  Definitely not suitable for a person with an active lifestyle.  Had I known this prior, I would not have purchased.

Purchased these as a Valentine‚Äôs Day gift for my husband. I wanted to wrap it in valentines paper and looked at the AirPods and noticed they didn‚Äôt fit snugly in the box like ALL Apple products do. Also there was writing on the case ‚ÄúLetsfit‚Äù and there were no instructions in the box either and the cord looks used.  I believe they sent me a used product or a clerk switched the new for the old.  I‚Äôm so upset about this!!!

I use these primarily for phone calls. Have occasionally utilized to watch a movie on iPad on the plane. It wasn‚Äôt too bad but not ideal. I really like the fact that I can use one at a time to extend use on a charge. I have one basic complaint. Everyone has these and so everyone has a little white case. We have 3 in our family. There should be some method to identify them without buying an after market solution

Just because it says it‚Äôs connected in the Bluetooth section of your iPhone means nothing. I‚Äôve been asked to turn things down twice now by others because guess who failed me and wasn‚Äôt connected when they should have been.  I don‚Äôt want to check the phone screen for the headphone symbol and wonder if they‚Äôre really connected or can others hear whatever I am listening to.  I have no confidence in these vs traditional wired earbuds or headphones these days.

review_title: Should volume level be less than regular wired earbuds or did I just get a defective pair???
product_review: I love everything about these AirPods. The ease of connectivity, ease of switching devices, the fit, sound quality, etc. The only thing I just couldn‚Äôt get passed, was the fact that the volume level was significantly lower than the free, wired earbuds you get with your iPhone or iPad. I don‚Äôt know if that is normal or if I just received a defective pair. Everyone I that owns a pair says they haven‚Äôt had any problems, but they also have never compared it with the regular earbuds either. I‚Äôve gotten mixed answers from Apple customer service. One saying they will be lower because of Bluetooth frequency and two of them saying they shouldn‚Äôt have a lower volume than regular earbuds. So, because I couldn‚Äôt get a straight answer, I just decided to return them today. At least now I can use my experience with this pair to compare it with another pair, if I decide to give AirPods 2 a second try.

review_title: Defective product....does not work at all
product_review: I was hesitant to purchase based on some of the bad reviews, and now know why. My AirPods came defective. Initially the left AirPod would not connect nor charge. I called Apple support and they suggested I update the software on my iPhone. That only made the issue worse. New other headphone pair, and I just get an error message...Apple said the product must be defective

review_title: I love my AirPods A LOT but....
product_review: I love them but they hurt my right ear sometimes.  They are slightly big for my right ear so it gets irritated and hurts when i put them on. The pain goes away after I give them a day off lol

review_title: Integration with mac book is not working well
product_review: Sound quality feeling pretty same as standard headphones coming with iphone. Mostly I use airpods with MacBook(2019) and iphone. It works mostly well with iPhone but not with MacBook. When airpods connect to laptop and enable microphone(in this mode sound quality is very bad), I need each time to switch microphone to macbook built-in. But this is not the biggest issue. Macbook in 30% fails to connect to airpods. iTunes show playing music but I don't hear anything. Also iTunes throwing error with some codes(haven't check) and disconnect airpods. After putting airpods to case and disconnecting them from laptop then can work again. If you want to use headphones with macbook then better not to buy wireless. So generally, I feel a little bit disappointed with integration with other Apple products.
I have iPhone and used different Bluetooth earbuds. Finally decided to buy these and they don‚Äôt disappoint like the other brands.
I love the AirPods. I had the AirPod pros and they gave me a really bad ear infection. Luckily the regular air pods do not seem to have the same effect

Been through about six pairs of headphones/earbuds for comparison and price but these serve cake to my senses. The classic fit is so nice. Works with TV bluetooth transmitter after some patience as usual. Update: Must use audio/aux (red/white-3.5) not optical cable on Vizio Smartcast to Toslink transmitter. iPhone connects instantly. Good!

My girlfriend and I are both working from home during the pandemic, and that means both of us have to take a lot of Zoom calls from our small condo. With us using these, we don't have to hear each others' bosses voices all day talking through the computer. Haven't fully tested yet, but they seem better than Air Pod 1s.
If mine weren't new, they were like new. Read some mixed reviews about people getting refurbs, but my experience was great. Good price, arrived quickly.

review_title: Be carful sharing your information to these reps .
product_review: Right earbud stop working . I called Amazon which they Refered me to apple support. . That was good . Apple support sent me the wrong ear bud . I sent the rightside ear bud back . Called back to get the correct earbud got apple rep in India which was nice but they had me to download a app that allow them to share my iPhone screen to there Computer Monitor . What‚Äôs alarming about this the apple rep want to look at my bank account to see Receipt Proof of purchase in my bank account. I immediately shut the screen down when found what they was doing . Since then I just got me a different brand of wireless earbud .

I love that I can take them out of the case and immediately they are connected and ready to go. I do wished they fit a little tighter in my ears. They seem to be loose compared to my Plantronics that fit a bit more snug. The sound quality is clear and nice although there is no volume control on them and I find myself digging out my phone to raise the volume. All in all I like them, but I wished they had more features.

review_title: NOT GENUINE APPLE DO NOT BUY
product_review: There is no way this is a genuine apple product. I had AirPods gen 1 and the battery was great. Lasted about a week with my typical use. I lost them and ordered these as a replacement. The battery does not even last 24 hours and my usage hasn‚Äôt change. DO NOT BUY THESE

Yay! Now I can take care of my baby and talk on the phone! These are very nice ear pods, and I‚Äôm so glad I didn‚Äôt buy the more expensive ones. My husband bought the beats headphones and spent a fortune, and these are just as good those. They come with a wireless charger, and that seems to last forever. They automatically connect to your ear on their own when you put it in your ear. I recommend them.

I love the AirPods. They cancel some sound, but I can still hear things I need to hear. They don‚Äôt really seem to be ‚Äúnoise-canceling‚Äù in the way over-ear headphones are, but perfect for me. I use them mostly for Audible books or Netflix. Battery life seems to be good based on the amount of use they get.

I ordered these with a small doubt in my mind that they were true Apple brand. When I received them, I verified the serial number on Apple.com and they REAL! The sound is amazing and they are simple to use. Basically just pop them in your ears and off you go!

AirPods are AirPods and I‚Äôm glad that what I received was nothing less. I was a little worried about my purchase after seeing a good portion of the reviews claiming fakes. I‚Äôd like to report that this is indeed a legit Apple product, that I managed to also buy during a discounted period on amazon.

I had the first gen AirPods and they were stolen. I bought the newest one and the upgrades are amazing! I can control my music with just my voice! Turn the volume up or down, skip songs, play playlists, basically everything Siri can do without even having to tap my AirPod to invoke Siri. The sound quality is clear and crisp and phone calls are crystal clear for both ends.

I got this as a surprise gift for my fiance to replace a cheaper wireless earbud he had, and he's very happy! Good sound quality, has microphone, has auto sound pausing when he takes it off, has better battery life, and has better fitting into his ears.

I love my AirPods. I mean, think everyone does lol. Gone are the days of the wire blocking the way of the workout or just life. I‚Äôve always wanted something with this concept and I‚Äôm glad that I was able to get these in particular. I love how I can also use the Find My Phone app on my phone to find them in my bed when I fall asleep with them in my ear. 5 stars all around.

review_title: A good blue tooth earphone sets but it comes in 3 pieces, Lose one you have to replace the set!
product_review: good bluetooth sound and fits nicely in ear. One size fits all nothing to get stuck in the ear canal you have to fish out. However it is a three piece unit - left ear, right ear, charging unit. Nothing connecting the two ear pieces so it is all too easy to lose one ear piece then the whole does not work. I'm going back to a unit that holds the plugs together as I lost one of the plugs. they're rather expensive to replace.

The Apple AirPods it‚Äôs a great product the only problem I have with it is that it does not cancel out the noise in the background so you cannot use it if you are taking care of business. I use another product to help the AirPod stay in my ears when I am at the gym or running. The clarity is fantastic the sound quality when I‚Äôm listening to my music is fantastic.  This product works for me. Let‚Äôs your decision be your guide.

review_title: Battery died while am on a important call.
product_review: Horrible I was on a very important phone call when the battery died and ended my phone call. I was so disappointed, it doesn't keep changing. I cannot answer a call by tapping the AirPod, I can only answer by taking the phone out of my pocket. I don't want to do that so I will be returning them for a refund.

As reluctant as I was to purchase, I‚Äôm certainly happy I did. The setup process is simple, and the interface on iPhone is foolproof. While I experienced some difficulty with disconnection/failure to connect about a month after purchase, the problem was easily resolved with a reset of the AirPods.

These were a Christmas gift for my son! When they arrived they were sealed and everything but when he opened them on Christmas morning and went to connect them, they had been obviously been synced to someones phone before. they were recognized as "baby's airpods". I then took a closer look and noticed there was several scratched and little nicks on the airpods. The description doesn't say they are used, so I was expecting NEW!!!!

I just realized this product is exactly same as last generation, the only difference is its case support wireless charging, but the price is 50 bucks higher. I would buy airpods pro instead of this one. I don't recommend this product especially if you don't have a wireless charging pad at home.

Bought this for my husbands birthday. He absolutely loves everything about them. He is most impressed at how well they stay in his ears. He was concerned about them falling out when he mowing and other yard work. They haven‚Äôt fallen out yet. Of course, you can expect the great sound and quality from the apple product...

These airpods are clearly refurbished. Consistent issue is the left AirPod is almost totally out of charge after being in the case for several hours, when I KNOW they were in the case properly. I have several Apple products and know them well, will NEVER buy from anywhere but Apple directly in the future. Save yourself aggravation, get from the source.

review_title: Easy to set up, sound good, price has come down a bit
product_review: Bought these for my son, turns out he already has them. My wife claimed them and loves them. How easy are they to set up? She did it herself without my intervention. That never happens.

review_title: I will not buy refurbished accessories again
product_review: I purchased these refurbished to save money to see if I preferred AirPods or

Christmas Gift for my husband who seems to enjoy them even though he scoffed when he opened (price for 1gift)! He loves that they are wireless and can walk around his job without phone or cords. It sounds as if they have good range before music starts to cut out. No issues with sound quality or charge holding up...to me it‚Äôs a win!

I got this about a month ago and on the second day of receiving them the music started cutting out and disconnecting from my phone. I thought it was just my phone so I disconnected it and repaired it again, but the problem kept persisting. The beat and sound are pretty good in my opinion and there is a little bit of noise cancelling but not that much since these are not the pros. I am going to update my review when I receive my new pair in a few days but for now I am rating them 2/5. The return is very easy and when I called up apple they made it sound like so much more work. I really like that I can go to my local Kohls to return them, with Amazon instead of having that whole process with Amazonüëçüèº.

When they actually work, they are amazing earbuds. They are AirPods, however this is the fifth pair that I‚Äôve had the sound go out on in less than a year. Apple is pretty good about replacing them, but I‚Äôm getting tired of having to go through 40 minutes of Apple support to wait 5-7 business days for a new pair that works for 2 months before doing the same thing.

No more wire tangle mess to deal with.  Makes listening to music when going to the gym or for a run easier.  Love the auto-detect and auto-connect too iPhone feature.  In the Bluetooth settings, you can set what double-tap does when you double-tap the left or right airpod (e.g. Siri, Play/Pause, Next Track, Previous Track, or Off).  Only wished there was feature you can set volume, but I just have to do it by hand or have Siri do it, but Siri tends to increase/decrease in increments of 2 I think.  Opening your Airpod case will display the battery life on your iPhone or you can set it as a widget in Batteries.  Overall I love them!

I order new AirPods and got used defective AirPods. When package arrived it was placed in old opened bubble wrapping not in the traditional Apple packaging the cord was placed in the box in a circular direction with the AirPods sitting in the middle. It was obvious they were used. In trying to pair them they would not pair completely. Prior to trying the option to reset, a message came up ‚Äúnot your AirPods‚Äù üò≥. I was so disappointed with the purchase!
The sound is great. Fits nicely in my ears. They don‚Äôt fall out easily. I love using them when working out or running

PERFECT. recently got finessed for a pair of new airpods on letgo. they have the same packaging & software as apple brand airpods but sounded off & had a habit of randomly disconnecting. eventually the charger case melted my airpods & i couldnt get them out of the case. i think they were factory rejects. so i had to order new ones. these work perfectly & im 100% satisfied

I was skeptical about buying these because all the reviews about people receiving fake AirPods, I figured I would order them and if they were fake I would return them for a full refund, but I was pleasantly surprised. They are the real deal, the sound is superb and the quality is what you would expect from an Apple product. I would buy again and I would recommend.
If you like fake airpods these are the way to go

review_title: Paid $100. They‚Äôre not worth more than that.
product_review: If you can get the for 100 or less then go for it. They‚Äôre convenient, the sound is decent, can be located using find my iPhone, they pair easily and work well for phone calls.

Left AirPod did not charge correctly right out of the box. I could charge the entire thing overnight, and it was always percentages behind and then maybe caught up, and maybe didn‚Äôt after charging off of the wireless case. This was very inconvenient, and resulted in them dying on me a couple of times. Cool concept but if it doesn‚Äôt work, it doesn‚Äôt matter.

I do not know whether its because I used it in University, because I have an android phone, or because I might have gotten a broken unit. Either way the connection was terrible. The moment I put my phone in my pocket the sound would go out or become magnitudes worse.  I ended up returning it but when it did work, mostly in my tiny apartment, it was really cool lasted a while and sounded alright. Either way not being able to take earbuds outside is kind of a deal breaker.

review_title: AirPods are great, work nearly perfectly
product_review: AirPod set up and use is predictably easy as the name brand Apple product.  Warning tone is issued on a low battery. Peering is extremely easy. There are a number of third-party cases. Only regret, wish I knew there was a new version coming out days after I purchase these. Beyond that you get what you pay for. Wireless charging is awesome.

review_title: They fall out ALL the time
product_review: Apple, this isn't your finest hour. These connect great and are easy to charge. However, they fit terribly. I tried the hacks online and ordered silicone covers. They still don't fit well, but the covers do help. I guess I will keep them to use only indoors working around the house. If you are looking for something to exercise with these --good luck. Keep looking....
Purchased for new, got a used. They even fought for dear life to remove my last comment cause it was too detailed on exposing their scam.
This is a good wireless with iPhones. Looks premium. Sound quality is not great when compared to Jabra elite 75t for the same price(even $10 less). Good fit, sporty and goes well with Siri.

review_title: How can only complain about this product?
product_review: If you have other Apple products, you will love how easily these connect to those. Just pull them out of the case, and you are connected. My son wanted these wireless charging ones because he has a wireless charging Apple phone, but we have other Airpods that aren't wireless charging and we like those too.

These came with no way to charge them? How am I supposed to get a product that will die in a day with no way to charge them? There's should 100% be a means of charging them included in the purchase of the product. You can't sell a product without the one essential cord to keep it alive.
Bought these for my wife just before the next generation was announced. #appleProducts

I have bought other knock-offs and jlabs. The jlabs were fine but always fell out of my ears. These are perfect. I shoulda just bought these to begin with. I like how they fit and use gravity to stay in my ear. Plus, I don‚Äôt want complete noise cancelling so I can hear the environment around me. Also, I had ordered the wired case but the day before they shippped amazon dropped the price on the wireless charging case. It made it $10 to get the wireless charging case. So, cancelled and orders these and still got them the day I was originally supposed to. Seamless transaction with amazon! I honestly couldn‚Äôt be happier with these perfect little gems!!

Now that I have these, I can't imagine ever going back... I can now listen to podcasts and talk on the phone while cleaning or running around the house, without being connected to cords and my phone. It's amazing. The best part: anyone I've talked to on the phone says the sound quality on their end is great. No muffled or far away sounding calls. Highly recommend!
It is very convenient to connect to iPhone.The sound quality of all the bands is very good.One thing is not good is that you can't connect with other brands.

Gave Apple AirPods with Wireless Charging Case this rating because one of the buds had a buzzing noise that wouldn't go away after repairing/resetting. Amazon CS was great sent exchanged a new pair without question. Let's see if the new pair sounds better.

review_title: work great and the best gift i have given for a while
product_review: my wife loves these for taking calls and calling into work meetings.  highly recommend. she also loves to use them on runs so i say they are worth every penny.  the only tricky bit i wish someone told me is that the pro versions have some earpieces that could help if you have unusual ears.  this model is a one size fits all and i find it doesn't fit in one of my ears perfectly. something to consider.

review_title: Anyone else having trouble with defective speakers?
product_review: One of the speakers are deficient and I need to return them for a replacement.  How do I do that

review_title: totally serves the purpose of being hands free.
product_review: I bought this item as a X-mas gift for my daughter, she loves them and said they were the best gift ever.  She loves the fact that she can now speak in all her commands, and utilize the 1 touch functions, for phone calls, play music, and controlling volume. These Apple AirPods are a must have.

If you commute every day, headphones are an essential. I have the beats studio headphones as well which work great to cover my ear during winter like earmuffs, but these 90+ degree days in the city make me super happy I made this purchase. Also, with the beats they pick up sound when I‚Äôm on a call. These AirPods do not and other people hear me crystal clear and not background noise as much. They don‚Äôt feel like they will fall out like I thought and also don‚Äôt have to spend 5 minutes untangling the cord on the old ones. No buttons to push they know when to turn off and on on their own! To see the battery percentage just lift the lid near your iPhone and it pops right up. Didn‚Äôt even have to sync anything have your Bluetooth enabled on your iPhone which I always do anyway

It‚Äôs good. I tried a few inexpensive wireless ear sets off Amazon; I liked none of them and decided to just buy this AirPod not to spend any more time on selecting by just spending the money this AirPod asks for.

Finally decided to get these headphones and I'm not disappointed at all. I received them very fast. They were new, factory sealed. I was a little worried based on some of the reviews I saw but the ones I received were not refurbished. Battery life seems great and they are so easy to pair with an iPhone. Best headphones I've ever owned.

I bought these AirPods and they are absolutely amazing! They work perfectly. When I bought these online I was a little bit worried that they might come fake or not from Apple but no, they are authentic apple AirPods! Definitely recommend buying if you also are on quarantine and want noise cancellation AirPods! 5/5 stars recommend!!

review_title: HOW DO THEY NOT FALL OUT
product_review: First off, I am amazed at how these airpods are able to stay in your ears. Second, the sound is gorgeous. I use these to study at night and the hip hop instrumentals sound phenomenal. Solid bass too. Im excited to see what Apple has in mind by noise cancellation cause these do the trick. So far. The whole "take an airpod out and the music pauses" thing is more convenient than you think.

review_title: Did not work as they supposed
product_review: They arrived fast, everything looked ok, but double tap does not work at all in both aipods. Tougth was because my iphone Xs max software was not updated, so I download latest ios version, try to look online for a way to reset o fix de problem. Nothing worked. I thought about keeping them since everything else seems to work ok, but if you spend more than a $100 in something supposedly high quality, and my old, cheap, non recognized brand earbuds did work better than these "apple airpods. It is just not fair. I will try to ask for a refund or exchange from amazon, hopefully everything will work fine. I buy regulary and never had any important issue.

I got a good deal and i love them. At first i was having trouble with the volume but i fixed it by watching a YouTube video, it was just my phone not wanting to go too high for your ears. My dad loves them and my husband will be buying some soon too. The only thing is that the noise cancellation isnt the greatest, i can hear everything the other person and people around them are saying and doing which it can be kind of loud and annoying.

review_title: I‚Äôll say is worth the money.
product_review: Sound quality is good for not being over the ear headphones. It‚Äôs very loud and battery lasts for about 3 to 4 hours. Easy to control and connects fairly quickly if you‚Äôre using an iPhone. The down side is if you‚Äôre planning to run or go jogging with them, they will not stay in your ears. I strongly recommend something to hold them in place. The case gets dirty easy and you can miss place them easy.

review_title: Great sound with Mac and other devices, connect to Samsung Smart TV
product_review: In addition to great sound the Airpods also have a mic imbedded so you can use them for dictation on a Mac Book Pro - and maybe be other Mac's or a PC. Connect to my Smart TV so I can listen independently with others undisturbed In the same room.

I absolutely adore these. I‚Äôve worn them every day for months. The charging case is incredibly convenient and these are the only ear buds I‚Äôve ever tried that don‚Äôt hurt my ears. I put them in and I can‚Äôt even feel them. Even after 12 hours of wear. The sound is excellent. The noise canceling effect is excellent. These are one of my very favorite things.
The AirPods was open and broken, I just order a new one and they sent me this. It looks like it's still working, but I paid for new ones and not for used and broken ones.

I love my AirPods! They‚Äôre amazing and although I have small ears and was nervous about discomfort they are completely fine! I use them on and off for about 8 hours during my work day and one of my favorite things is that I can charge one pod at a time. With 5 hours of continuous use I can use one at a time and charge the other and have 10 hours with just one pod at a time. I‚Äôm 100% satisfied with my purchase. I waited about a year till I finally caved and purchased them and it was one of the best decisions I‚Äôve made!

I was hesitant to buy these but they are by far the best purchase I've made as far as music accessories go, they even beat my Beats headphones.  The battery life is UNREAL I charge them once like every two weeks, if that and use them constantly!  It was also cheaper to buy them on here than from the apple store by about $20!

I love these! I use them everyday, i love the sound. I love everything about it! Also the delivery was fast. I checked the AirPods right away when it was delivered to make sure they‚Äôre new because some of the reviews were not good. But i love mine!

I love them, They feel fine now but when I got them in the beginning my ears were real sore because I have small ear openings but after awhile it is fine.  I love that it automatically pauses when I pull one headphone out if someone is talking to me, and when you put it back in it automatically starts back again w/o you doing anything.

Apple AirPods with Wireless Charging have excellent sound quality. Noise cancellation wonderful. Long lasting battery. Hard sturdy storing case. Easy & comfortable in my ear. Very easy to connect to phone or laptop. Excellent price. Pure quality.

The only reason that I gave them a 3 it‚Äôs because they hurt my ears when I put them on and they fall of my ears quite easily after a short while. This is my second set and it‚Äôs always been the same problem and most commonly almost everyone that I had talk to to have the same problem. Other than that they are absolutely great.
I always used headsets; converting to these air pods feels like pure luxury.

review_title: Lasted less than two months before becoming unusable.
product_review: Bought these because my old AirPods had finally reached the end of their rope. I thought it‚Äôd be good to have wireless charging since we have a few charging pads throughout the house. Within six weeks of me getting these they totally stopped working. The wireless charging didn‚Äôt work. When I plugged them in, only one ear bud would connect and then even that one would flitter in and out of connectivity. I tried unpairing and repairing multiple times, with no success. AirPods are absolutely trash and a waste of money.

These have saved me in the car, at the gym etc... I highly recommend this product and it is exactly as described. You can also purchase protection plan in case you lose them. Just make sure to go buy a protective case so if you drop them it doesn‚Äôt hurt them.

This is a resold product.  Not at all ‚Äúlike new‚Äù considering there are scuff marks on the charging case. They work fine, seem legit Apple, were clean (thank god), connected with ease, and the battery seems fine so I‚Äôll keep them for the price, but they definitely popped up as someone else‚Äôs AirPods upon connecting.

Love my AirPods and so glad that I purchased them. Read previous reviews but these are authentic AirPods and have an Apple serial number that can be located on the Apple website. Great product and they have definitely made working out, cleaning and doing other tasks easier without the wires being attached to the headset.

Well I wasn‚Äôt sure if I should buy from Apple or from Amazon. With Covid - I could not get into Apple store and I needed them for at home meetings as well as drowning out background noises of contractors in home while I tried to work from home.

Because the case was broken they were not charging properly so i had to take to work to charge cause the kept dying every hour. And since the case was broken it didn‚Äôt close right and and i lose them, must of fallen out of my pocket. Now i only have one AirPod because i had to be charging every hour... i was going to send back but now it‚Äôs to darn late!!!

A little disappointed in these, I only had them for 2 months and the right one is separating at the top. I called to see if I could get it replaced but Apple said it wasn‚Äôt covered under warranty since it was a ‚Äúphysical‚Äù problem. So they told me I could replace the right one for 75.00. I‚Äôll just wait till it completely breaks the get another brand.

Love these! I will say the battery doesn‚Äôt last as long as my cheaper warranty pods (non-Apple ones), but the sound quality, mic, and noise canceling is superior for sure. Love that I can charge them in their case. Worth the extra cost!

I have small ear canals. So the problem I have had is keeping them in properly! I have to fiddle with them constantly. I really don‚Äôt like the fact that they are a hard plastic. I would prefer a soft earbud. The quality is excellent as with all Apple products. Great sound and easy pairing to all your Apple devices!

Bought a set for my wife.  She loves them.  Sound quality is excellent and the buds are very lightweight.  Easy Bluetooth setup.  They stay in her ears and are comfortable to wear.  I think that they are "pricey" but if my wife is happy with quality and ease of use, then I am happy too.

I received this today and was excited to use it as i had wanted to purchase it from the Apple store. I noticed that the indicator light is hidden when there is a cover on the unit. But most of all, i received the unit with the Right ear piece missing. Please send me right ear piece and i will update review.

review_title: Works great but could be a little more comfortable, wish they were silicone
product_review: Took a while to pair, not really sure why. The sound is great and they connect just fine now. I do think for $200, they should be a little more comfortable. Hard plastic in my ear isn't the best feeling in the world. Why not soft silicone? It would make a lot more sense!!

So. A few days ago I bought these airpods with the wireless charging case, and when it got delivered, I instantly noticed that the case is squeaking and it‚Äôs just so unsatisfying. Few days later, I set up a replacement and it came today. I don‚Äôt know if this is normal but my brand new AirPods are making a ringing noise and honestly it almost hurts. I don‚Äôt know what to do now because I don‚Äôt want amazon to think I‚Äôm just returning products left and right even though I don‚Äôt want to have some messed up AirPods. If they didn‚Äôt do that and they were perfectly fine, then I would probably give these a 5 star but mine are messed up and I hope nobody else‚Äôs AirPods are like mine but if they are then let me know please.
Great for taking phone calls around kids. Keeps your hands free and has no cord for kids to pull. Sound quality is great and works seamlessly with the iPhone.

review_title: The most amazing wireless headphone ever!
product_review: I‚Äôve put this purchase off for a while.

These were definitely an open box return. The clues were 1) no plastic wrap over the box and 2) they were named ‚ÄúAirPods de Maria‚Äù when I paired for the first time. Thanks amazon for being a bit liberal with the ‚ÄúNew‚Äù designation üôÑ
I've used bose in the past and the difficulty switching between devices and build quality was very frustrating.

Terrible. I order wireless charging ones and I got the regular. I got them replaced and after one month the left pod stopped working. I did a factory reset and now they won‚Äôt wirelessly charge or reconnect to my phone. Very disappointed

I liked this AirPod. The quality is good but randomly only 1 of the ear bud will connect even thought both of them are fully charged. I have to disconnect and then connect manually to make both of them work. Otherwise it will a 5 star item.

review_title: Very expensive for nothing too fancy
product_review: Nice to be wireless. However it has to be deliberate holding back of tech in these pods. Capabilities  that these should have like voice answering/calling and text message via Siri and other obvious useful functions.

review_title: Best AirPod ever and super un expense
product_review: Awesome product! ... the Airpods come ore charge so you can used right away, as soon I turn on bluetooth on my iphone the irpod were detectcectüëå And work perfectly!

review_title: The best earbuds for the money
product_review: Pros-never fall out of your ears, excellent battery life. After trying many cheaper products, I had to break down & purchase these. Don‚Äôt EVEN waste you time or money on cheaper brands unless you just want to listen to music & not use to talk.

These are very comfortable to wear.  Charge very quickly and have great sound.  I would recommend this model because I don't think it's necessary to have the charging station.  They charge quickly with a regular iphone charger.

What else can be said about these airpods other than this:  You will be shocked how much you use them.  I wear them daily, either in my office taking conference calls, and/or at the gym, where ive never had an issue with them falling out due to sweat.

Ease of use and of pairing with my new iPhone 11 Max Plus ‚ù§Ô∏è I did not order these wanting noise cancellation (which these do not have).  I read other reviews that said noise cancellation was not a feature of these but was on the newer version for more $$ ... perfect for my wants

review_title: magnetic airpods made nice work well
product_review: i purchased these for my 11 year old son. I was wondering how he would do taking these pods in and out of that small case. He has done well with them .  These pods are magnetic and when you open the case and go to put them in the specific spot they go into it sort of grabs them with the magnet ..this has helped him never drop them. we also got the clear case holder cover..its nice to have . great product.

Great purchase!!! Glad I got to save money with them being on sale. There are the real thing. Mine came fully sealed in plastic wrap and I verified my serial # with Apple right away. Super happy! Just make sure you‚Äôre purchasing as ‚ÄúSold by Amazon‚Äù to ensure it‚Äôs not coming from a third party seller.

Had some sync issues in the beginning, I was not able to figure out what was happening, but after a quick google search and and good reset of the air pods it started to work. Once it syncs properly with the phone I have had no issues.

Models numbers match up, brand new in the box 100% legit and work great, get up around 120 ft away without something blocking signal hooks up instantly and flawlessly.  I would recommend to anyone who doesn't already have the first model.

Ordered this because my teenage daughter has a pair, my wife has an android and these can be connected to her phone. I even found an app to pop up on her screen when she open the case like on the iphone. My wife loves them. I might get me a pair.

review_title: Good fit, light and good mic and headphone quality
product_review: Excellent form factor and good fit. The pairing process is oversimplified and pairing those with multiple device is possible. You still have to select the AirPods from the device whenever you want to use them. Automatically detects if you are using a single one or both. The sound quality is good, apparently especially the mic, people said the sound is much better. I have experienced some drops from time to time, it turned out I had too many bluetooth devices connected at the same time. Now, interference problem solved.

review_title: Quality and price, Ask Siri feature available on this series
product_review: I recently ordered the Apple air pods to pair with my Apple Watch, after a brief charge and removal from the wireless charger, they immediately paired with my watch and iPhone. The connection set up was relatively easy and required little time, I would definitely recommend these, gave 4 stars primarily because the advertisement post stated the newest generation and they were offered at a great price.  However after contacting an Apple Representative learned they are not, the sound is flawless and satisfying and the fit is remarkable. Updated star review accidentally entered 1 star.

BETTER THAN EXPECTED.... thought I would not use as much but I LOVE these I was using them while on a tractor mowing my lawn and I could barely hear the tractor very easy to use... NOT FOR JUST IPHONE if you have problems with use just YouTube there is plenty of videos to help... SHIPPED EARLY BY A DAY

review_title: Can‚Äôt beat them if you have other Apple products
product_review: AirPods are great. If you‚Äôre a big Apple fan and have an iPhone, MacBook, etc. you‚Äôll never look back once you have these. I find they could definitely be louder on an airplane, but any other time, volume and sound quality are perfectly good. I‚Äôll admit though I‚Äôm excited to try the AirPod Pros.

review_title: Order new if u want legit ! I love mine ! Well worth the $$
product_review: I love having legit AirPods !!! Glad I didn‚Äôt have to pay full price at apple !!! They are legit , I ordered the un-used one because I saw some disappointments and others getting ripped off for knock off air pods even the sound quality is great !

I own both versions of the Apple AirPods. The second version also does not allow you to turn the volume up all the way without a damn apple iPhone! If you use there apple nano to play music through there damn AirPods don't expect to be able to turn the volume all the way up, only siri can do that! BS, that they are able to charge so much for such piss poor functionality! No, I will not buy a damn iPhone!

I absolutely love these. Battery life last way longer than expected and just having the habilita to charge them in the same case is a very nice detail. If you are buying Apple you know what you are getting so really there is not much to say.

I never in my life thought I would pay this much money for basically fancy earbuds. They are so much more than I really thought. The sound quality is amazing. Being able to double tap my earbud to alert Siri or go to the next song is so wonderful. Just taking your earbud out will pause your audiobook or song. As far as I can tell, the battery life is decent and being able to charge them in the case is fantabulous. I am a HUGE fan of Airpods now.

review_title: Fit not universal. Works for some ears but not all
product_review: I cannot use these when working out or even something as minor as having a meal.  They seem fall out, so to ensure that I do not have a mishap and lose them, I do not wear them when I am active.

These fit in my ear perfectly.  I love the charging case and I love that they pause the music when I pull one out of my ear, and restart when I put it back.  Awesome!  My husband's ears are larger than mine, so he had to order lightweight rubber inserts so they'd stay in his ears.

I love how these just work. You really don't have to think about managing anything if you pair it with an iPhone. The only issue I have with these is... I wish it wasn't made from shiny plastic... If it was available in matte colors then I wouldn't be annoyed with how slippery and fingerprinty it gets. Not to mention scratches are way easier to see on shiny plastic. But other than that they are an amazing piece of tech!

review_title: You think why should I get these things but yes they really are worth it.
product_review: I have these for myself and bought some for my son. I usually just use the speaker or wear my Sony's for music but my headset is bulky and when I am a place like the doc's office these are convenient.  I don't carry a purse anymore so I just hook these to my phone wallet and I have the all the time and the battery life is insane they stay charged for quite a bit of time.

review_title: Not bad, but check what you are getting.
product_review: An obviously used product. Scuffs on the case, and on the Airpods themselves. The box practically opening inside the amazon packaging. I personally have no problems with used Airpods, but at this price point, you might want to double check to make sure yours are new. Sound is great, so is charging and whatnot, but disappointed on a "Used-like new" product to be obviously used to this extent. Even the Airpods had someone's name on them.

These are a great thing to have. I love that you can say ‚Äúhey Siri, play _____‚Äù and it happens. I use them when I ski so I don‚Äôt have to have a wire or use my hands at all. I did buy an adapter for the earpiece so it stays in my ear more securely since they are rather expensive and finding a tiny white headphone in snow would be next to impossible.

review_title: Perfect! No issues with connection or anything!
product_review: These are perfect for listening to music, playing games on my PC, going on my phone, and I've had no issues whatsoever with the bluetooth connection. The only times where the connection seems to die is if the airpods are low on battery. Charges quickly, battery drains slowly, exactly the way they were designed to.

I bought these as a gift to surprise my wife. She loves them. They were a wonderful gift, easy to connect, and charge fairly quickly. The only problem is she tends to forget to charge the case, but is getting better as she uses them. Best unexpected gift ever!

review_title: One size doesn‚Äôt fit all Apple!
product_review: Not an Apple/PC guy....I just want things to work, whoever makes it, idc.  They sounded fine, but the fit for me while working out wasn‚Äôt going to cut it.  Constantly checking to see if they‚Äôre still in my ears all the time isn‚Äôt ideal.  If they drop in price and come in black, I may get them for office use.

review_title: Good product of not using in the gym and being active
product_review: I bought it for the gym because it‚Äôs the only place I‚Äôd use it and it was cheaper than the beats pro. If you just want headphones this is great if they can stay in your ear. If you looking for something for gym use i wouldn‚Äôt recommend this at all. Fell out my ear 3x and I decided I don‚Äôt want them!

I finally buckled under peer pressure and bought a pair of Airpods. I love the wireless charging feature and how the airpods magnetically slip into their slots in the case. As for sound quality, it's good, not great. There is no noticeable noise cancelation to speak of but that's not why I bought them.

I love my AirPods, I do not leave the house without them. Quality is great and they are so comfortable that I have to check if they‚Äôre still in my ear at times. I contemplated on making this purchase for too long, if you have wanted these for awhile and need someone to say ‚Äújust buy them‚Äù do it!

I purchased the AirPods about four weeks ago and at first grade. But in the last two or so weeks every phone call I have the receiver has complained they can‚Äôt hear me. What initially seemed to be a great purchase has now become a costly failed experiment.
It literally took a few seconds to set up straight from opening the box! Easy! Started listening to Pandora right away.
Disappointed with supposed longer lasting battery. Don‚Äôt buy the extended warranty for Amazon they just referred me to Apple.

These are life changing. They stay in your ears pretty much in any situation. Perfect for a workout. The sound quality is good, could be a tad louder. Not sure why the noise cancelling rating came up, they don‚Äôt have active noise cancelling.

I was on the fence if I wanted to spend this much money on earphones. They are worth every penny! So glad I got them, they are my second favorite iPhone accessory (behind the Apple Watch). I don‚Äôt like silicone earbuds so I‚Äôm glad Apple still sells this style.

I charged them up and popped them in my ear and promptly forgot I was wearing them.  The sound was clear and I was finally able to just walk around the house and not worry about choking myself on the cord.

I like the convenience and small size.  I do not like that they did not stay in my ears if I was moving about. I bought some EarBuddyz to do the trick but they do not fit in the charging case so need to removed for storing or charging. They can be clipped to a case.ü§ó All in all I am happy as all my toys are Apples.

For the amount of money you spend why is the battery life so short.  3 hours is not enough time.  The battery life needs to be extended.  Sometimes the sound will go out in one ear.  I expected a lot more but got a lot less.

Bought them for my son. They are great . They are actually way louder than I expected. I didn't expect the quality to be as good as it is but was wrong. No problem. I have nothing to complain about . They are great
These are to replace the original pair I lost in Las Vegas... these are better than the original ones

review_title: The best if you like this style.
product_review: I've never felt comfortable with the ones that goes into my ear canal, and I don't understand why almost all big brands prefer that style, while there are many of us who don't like it. Anyways, if you prefer this style and want a good sound quality, AirPods would satisfy you.

review_title: Do not stay connected to iPhone
product_review: They sounds okay, but I struggle with them staying connected to my iphone.

I love them. They came brand new (not surprising considering amazon is now an authorized apple seller) they sound great and half the time I forget they are even there little expensive but they are still cheaper then apple.com. I love the double tap feature I set mine so left is previous track and right is next also if you take one out the music automatically pauses and despite what some people think (including me) they connect to anything even if it‚Äôs not apple product

Love the Airpods!  Very light weight.  Don't hurt my ears and the sound quality is wonderful.  They have some noise cancellation but not much.  I do wish the battery lasted a bit longer.  Definitely get some!!
I‚Äôm in love with the quality. Came clean and nicely packaged everything there. Easy af to connect. Was supposed to get here Monday and came early ! Hella excited.

Got these item for a second time after I had an accident with my first pair.  Got them fast, good price.  They're super comfortable and they sound great.  Was concerned first time I got them that they might slip out and i'd lose them, but once they're in the ear they don't bounce out.  Very well designed product.

I gifted it to someone and so far, no complaints from that person. Uses it everyday for music and video chats with me and says it's a good one. Doesn't hurt the ears and the noise cancellation works. Battery life is good since it's fairly new. Sound is awesome, too. Works well even in distance as well.

I bought the Apple AirPods with wireless charging case.  I saw some reviews that they were not Apple products.  The AirPods I received are Apple and new (not refurbished).  I am very happy with this product.

The work great with my Apple products, and battery life is pretty good. It a bit of a PITA having to reconnect them to my Kindle every time, but that may be the Kindle. Other than that all my devices are Apple, and work great with these.

I was so excited to get my first pair of airpods for Christmas.  Unfortunately, once received, I became very frustrated as these AirPods either kept falling out or popping out of my ears. One airbus fell down an elevator shaft and the other popped out onto the street and was run over by a car! Unbelievable! I will tell everyone I know to buy the ‚Äúpros‚Äù, as they have 3 ear plug attachments and are soft compared to the original earbuds purchased.  VERY DISAPPOINTING APPLE; THESE WEREN‚ÄôT CHEAP!

i would give 5 stars but they arent very loud when your using them while working. been using them for a couple monthes , i keep them in all day and can still talk to people with them in. i mainly use for talking hands free.

review_title: Nothing can go wrong with them!
product_review: I feel like I got a great deal when I bought them and they sound good, even though I moved to Airpods pro but still sometimes I miss them when it comes to change or stop a song with a touch whereas in AirPods pro you have to press a little

I‚Äôve wanted the ease of wireless headphones for a while and I finally found them with the AirPods! I have small ears and the apple headphones have been the only ones that fit comfortably. I can wear them all day without discomfort! The sounds quality is excellent. The battery life is decent, but I do wish it was longer. The saving grace is that the case charges them quickly, so it‚Äôs easy to keep them at full battery. They also give you a chime as they are nearing the end of their charge. Overall I‚Äôm very satisfied with my AirPods!

I bought a cheap pair about 1 year ago.  They were never great.  They dropped from my ear every once in a while, the sound wasn't great.  I got these about a month ago.  Their sound is good (I mostly stream shows so sound isn't my primary focus).  They never fall out of my ears, and the wireless charging means I just pick up the case when I go and they are always ready.

I use these every single day! They have great battery life and the sound quality is great (especially the base). Your iPhone keeps track of the decibels as well, which has been helpful since I tend to have the volume up too high.

I got these for my daughter. She uses them almost on a daily basis for school. I have them to her for her birthday in March, so she has been using them for two months now. This morning, one stopped working. I‚Äôm surprised because I have all Apple products.

I don‚Äôt get the negative reviews on here. These were definitely brand new in box with the cellophane wrapper still on. Immediately connected to my iPhone XS as soon as I took a pod out of the case. As far as Bluetooth headphones go, these are good. They might not be some fancy over the ear studio headphones, but what more do you expect from a earbud? 5 stars.

Got these for meetings and to stream late at night. They are hard to connect (forget going between devices), I have to shut off Bluetooth, then turn it on, then try to connect a bunch of times, once connected they are cool. But then connect/disconnect at random. During meetings they connect/disconnect all the time when someone else speaks they turn off. Big pain. Gave up on them and bought headphones instead. Nice idea. Waste of money.

I could not get the apple insurance plan through apple because they looked up the serial number and said they were refurbished and used. Gross! The listing does not say refurbished!! Then it was too late to return them to Amazon.

review_title: Replaced my original AirPods because I lost them, but these are better
product_review: Okay as you can see by the 'headline' I lost my original AirPods. These are better all around. Got them this morning and put them on charge for about an hour, opened the case and was asked "Connect"? That's it, done. These connect much faster than the original and sound, of course, is excellent.

I had Airpods 1 but it had been stolen. At first, I felt nothing different because I'm not heavily addicted to music. However, I found the mega difference after I use other brand TWS earphones! So I back to Airpods 2!!
These make the music sound so clear the quality is terrific and the battery life has been great

review_title: Better than airpods 1 & pro model for sure
product_review: Much better than first generation & pro model of AirPods , faster connection , longer battery life ,better sound & loader volume than airpods pro
Is this acceptable? For my airpods  I mean as they show up on my phone as  Rodney‚Äôs iPods to be out the packaging? Literally the only thing in the box was the charger. That‚Äôs ridiculous!?

Game changer. Same quality as the corded variety that comes with the iPhone, but sans wires. Connecting is super easy and the connection is rock solid - no in and out like a lot of other Bluetooth headphones.

These are great, when they work.  I have to reset and re-pair mine frequently because the left airpod ceases charging.  I don't know why re-pairing is required just for it to charge but it is.  I recommend buying these directly from Apple, at a store, or at least adding Apple Care if buying via Amazon.  They worked great for the first couple months (bought it September 2019) but the last couple weeks I have to constantly re-pair.

review_title: Right Pod Died After Four Months
product_review: The Right Pod just started to lose volume, and then was almost completely dead. I'm chatting with Apple now to get a replacement, and I feel like I'm giving a Congressional deposition. Hopefully, I can get a replacement shortly.
I love mine I alway forget to charge them or even sometimes I forget to put them back in the case and they are still charged depending how long I leave them out

review_title: the right airpod stopped working after my return policy was gone.
product_review: My air pod were working great until one day i noticed that if i put the left one in first the right would not connect. I would have to put them back in their case and then put the right one in first.  That was not a big deal until the right air pod stopped charging. I had the case plugged in and the air pods inside all night only to wake up with the right one being at 2% when everything else was 100. To make matters worse I am no longer allowed to return this faulty product.
So much more convenient than getting wrapped in a headphone cord while my phones in my pocket. Some noises come thru super loud to the ppl I‚Äôm talking to tho. Sounds great to me tho üòÇ

review_title: Overall good product, makes my ears ring...

I love the AirPods. They do everything I thought they would. I was skeptical because fakes are getting better, but these are real. I wish people would stop saying they are noise cancelling because they aren‚Äôt. Another person complained the battery only lasts 5 hours. Well that‚Äôs how long Apple says they last. Then you have to charge them in the case. So many dumb people writing reviews.

review_title: I actually think these things are life-changing
product_review: The best set of ear buds I have ever had. Brilliantly simple set up and operation. I can be anywhere in my house and uses with my phone just left in the kitchen. Great battery life. Great sound. Their pairing and operation  really do seem to be almost magical .
Use these for taking hands free and listening to music or audio books while working out. Great charge and hold it for days almost a week of everyday use! Would highly recommend this!

According to some reviews
