review_title: Easy to use, Reliable, Best Call Quality but Poor Sound
product_review: LOOKS:

I got these for my granddaughter she has always begged for air pods and I found these and decided I would buy them for her since they were cheap and looked to be real air pods. when they finally came in, the packing and air pods looked untouched and new which I was very happy to see! even though the packing looked different from the real one, I thought it was just an update in their packaging and brushed it off, as the air pods looked new and real. I gave them to my granddaughter and she was so excited to have air pods of her own, she said she loved them and couldn't thank me enough. But that same day she came up to me and said the air pods didn't look like real air pods, I told her that they seemed to look real to me and she pulled up a picture of what apple air pods looked like, I told her that though they looked different, since they seemed real to me, I wasn't going to return them.

If you scroll through my reviews, you're going to see a LOT of wireless Bluetooth earbuds I've tried. Some are good, some not so much. I was looking for the right pair, all the while trying to avoid the Apple Air Pod phenomenon.  I like Apple well enough, but the Air Pods looked like they're just waiting to be lost.

review_title: Broke after a couple of months, got screwed on the warranty
product_review: A family member bought me a set of Airpods in mid-July 2019 when they were on sale and then gave them to me as a Christmas gift in December 2019. I used the airpods relatively sparingly at first, but once the weather warmed up and I started to go outside on runs I really began using them quite a bit - maybe three times per week for an hour at a time.

review_title: Customer service made up for my troubles
product_review: I ordered a pair of airpods and used them roughly 3-4 months. After that they started to have problems where they would randomly connect to my phone when they were put away in the case. They would also be dead in the case randomly even though I charge them very frequently to keep them topped off. I was frustrated with this issue so I called apple directly and was on hold for roughly 30 minutes while waiting for someone to assist me. I talked to a supervisor for about an update and ran through about an hour worth of troubleshooting and determined there was an unknown defect. He told me that I would have to send them back and then he put me on hold to process an exchange. When he came back he told me to keep the current pair I had and they would overnight another pair directly to me. The one time I had a problem with an apple product they were quick to help me. When I'm due for a new phone I'm switching to Apple because Samsung has screwed me over multiple times. Thanks apple!

review_title: GREAT sound. Other than that, not so great
product_review: This is edited.  I originally gave the Air Pods 2 stars, but I'm upping it to 4 stars because the sound is really unbelievable.  Original review: I bought Air Pods at Best Buy and was immediately impressed by the sound quality.  By far, the  best quality sound I've found on ear buds.  But, the air pod is too big to stay in my ear like they show in photos. The ear wires cost an extra $20 and have to be removed every time you charge the air pods.  Some control is achieved by simply tapping the air pod, so I found that chewing on food while wearing the air pods can cause the program I'm listening to to pause.  I'm already shopping for new ear buds.  I like the TBI Pro, I own three sets, but they crap out after about two months of use.  The company even removed my model from their website, though it's still being sold here.

review_title: Apple is no longer a quality product, go buy beats
product_review: So .. just to let everyone kno in case any of u give a sh** .. about two years ago I bought a set of AirPods and a pair of wireless beats.. during that time I‚Äôve had to replace the AirPods 3 times.. never an issue with the beats.. and even with the last pair I bought, which are about 6 months old. I don‚Äôt know how this happened because this has never happened to me with headphones or speakers but they somehow lost sound quality and volume.. not the beats tho. The beats still work as if they were brand new. Not only do the beats work and sound better and are louder.. but the apple product just might be the absolute worst piece of china garbage rip off f*** me in the as* piece of electronic I‚Äôve ever purchased, and I buy a lot of cheap china product off alibaba so that should tell you a lot .. for the next iPhone apple is also switching from top of the line Samsung screens to cheaper china screens as well.. watch as apple destroys itself with cheap parts and rude staff in their stores. Your about to witness the decline of apple, mark my words over the next 5 years sales will drop and someone will purchase and revamp apple .. they are headed toward margins now, where the whole reason they were so successful in the first place was quality, simplicity and branding.. now they are branding to be a cheap china product .. hence why I had to purchase 4 pair of AirPods in just over two years and even now the 4th pair has lost sound quality .. definitely made me hesitant to buy another apple product. Seriously tho, I used to just walk into that store and buy buy buy. I‚Äôve purchase sooooooo many computers and phones and accessories from them without hesitation. Now I don‚Äôt know if I trust the quality anymore, and neither should you!

review_title: Apple's Airpods | Are They Worth It?
product_review: The Airpods by Apple were given to me as a gift.  I would say one of the biggest takeaways right off the bat is the price.  It is expensive.  But is it worth it?  From a straight forward, emotion sort of opinion on them, I have loved having them.  I at first refused to purchase them because I did not see the appeal if I had headphones that worked great anyways.  Once I started to use them though it didn't compare.

I recieved these as a christmas gift only to discover they didn't work as flawlessly as i had hoped. there was no charging cable for the case, like someone took it out. I used my iphone's charging cable i already had, but then discovered the case would not charge. It would not tell me how charged the case was. only when i very first paired it for the first time.. which I had a hard time charging in the first place. it showed up in my phone as i12... instead of airpod.. what is that about!? Had to return these and purchase them elsewhere.. only to find out, when comparing the old ones.. and my new ones.. that the these were actually a fake version of them!! the case looks different. Beware when buying these!!! The Fake ones button in the back is lower then than the real ones. there is no status light in the front, like there should be. the back hinge on the case lid, is even designed a little differently and you can hear a click when the lid closes.. the real one closes silently. the airpods themselves look slightly different. the fake ones has a light on the bottom that shows up when plugged in.. though it doesn't charge. I am disgusted by these that I would be sent fake ones. that is not what i was expecting. I was expecting the real thing! Left airpod in image is the fake one. right side is the real thing.. Beware!!

review_title: People Can't Understand You when Talking on Teams over a PC
product_review: I bought these during the COVID-19 Pandemic, working from home, and on Teams on a PC all day long.  Listening is fine although has a "scratchy" sound compared to the wired Apple headphones.  If I need to talk, however, nobody can understand what I am saying, and I have to revert to the wired headphones.  I'm pretty disappointed overall because they weren't cheap.  The whole purpose for having them was so I wouldn't have to sit at my desk at the end of a 36 inch cord.  I would not buy them again.

review_title: The left Airpod suddenly does not connect with the right
product_review: For a high priced product, you would expect Apple to produce quality products.  However, within a few months of buying these AirPods, the left airpod no longer connects with the right airpod.  Sound is only coming from the right Airpod.  I've tried turning bluetooth on and off, then forgetting the AirPods on the bluetooth settings menu and re-pairing them.  Nothing works.  The problem is so common that there is an Apple webpage dedicated for fixes to this issue.  Apple needs to admit there is a problem and fix it!!  I have an appointment with the Apple store during Covid and I am crossing my fingers they can fix the issue.

First, I've used these for over a year. The battery life has plummeted in that time. There are products that will help you keep track of these things and I strongly suggest anyone using these gets them. They are easily lost

I can't not give Airpods five stars. If technology could feel, mine would feel traumatized to be owned by me. I was gifted these earbuds two Christmases ago and they have survived me. They still work despite having been munched on by a dog and accidentally ran through the washer and drier. I left them to dry over night, tried them the next morning fully expecting to need a new pair, only for them to work just as normal. Audio did not change, only the microphone wavered -- they can't pick up my voice very well anymore -- but, I can't even pin that on the product itself considering myself. I will be purchasing future generations of this product. I love it.

I was not a fan of Bluetooth earpieces because 1. Having to always have to charge them 2. Wait a good while for it to get the full charge 3. They seem to feel bulky in my ear or not fit like I want them to however I decided to give these a try.

review_title: An order of AirPods, with barbecue on the side.
product_review: I pretty much buy everything on Amazon and 99.9% of the time I am a very happy customer.  Quite often I buy things from the Amazon warehouse too and most often the product I receive may not be perfect, but it is still as described so what I‚Äôm anticipating is what I receive.  That was not the case with these AirPods.

review_title: I highly recommend because it is so easy
product_review: AirPods are great. These do not have noise cancellation and there are definitely headphones with better sound quality but the ease of use and battery is unmatched. These connect to just about everything and it is so easy to just carry around and pull them out when you need. I use them with my tv, phone, iPad.... I bought one for everyone in my family from Black Friday and we all have been loving them these past months.  They automatically connect to my phone but if I need I can easily switch to my iPad and laptop within seconds. It‚Äôs also great that two different AirPods can connect to one phone like if my gf and I want to listen to the same music. The battery life is a couple hours long and you can fully charge them in the case for less than 20 min. They last more than a day so all you have to do is remember to charge the case every couple days. My only personal problem with them is the case is so small. You definitely need a rubber cover or something because its  slippery.

I bought my Air Pods this in August.  I was so excited to get them!  Well over the last few months,  I have honestly had nothing but problems with them.  Most of the time that I go to use them, the right pod doesn't play sound.  I constantly do have to go through all of the different troubleshooting tasks (inserting at same time, Bluetooth on and off, phone on and off, plugging in to charge, etc., and usually after about 10 or 15 minutes I can get the right pod to connect.  I don't think that this should be.  I paid $180 for these and while the sound quality is good, I should not have to spend so much time and effort trying to get the right pod to connect.  Today before my run I spend about 10 minutes going through all of the troubleshooting steps and finally they both connected.  Then about a mile into my run, the right pod stopped playing sound. This is so not cool.  Not sure what I should do now.  Needless to say I'm disappointed with these AirPods.
The AirPods are great. Nothing to add to the other positive reviews.

They just work. Just like everything else Apple, as soon as you open them they pair up with all your devices within minutes and it‚Äôs just smooth sailing from there. So easy to use, so wonderfully convenient, I can‚Äôt believe it took me so long to get a pair. And they‚Äôre so light and comfortable I find I just leave them in my ears even when I‚Äôm not using them.

review_title: Short battery life, hard to tell how much battery left
product_review: Battery runs out quickly (2 hours talking and you're done.) I was surprised how quickly and had to recharge twice first day i got them. The good thing is that you get 80% battery charge with 15 minutes on hardwired charge (not wireless.) It's a hassle to be charging them all day.

I wish I hadn‚Äôt procrastinated on purchasing AirPods! I wasted my money on two other ‚Äúknock off‚Äù sets.  These are extremely comfortable ( I have small ears), sound quality is good and battery life is great! I can seamlessly switch from an audiobook to a phone call without losing my place or having to make volume adjustments!  I wore them for hours without any discomfort- and that is saying A LOT, as I am typically unable to tolerate anything in my ears for longer than an hour. The distance I was able to walk away from the phone and still get reception was impressive.  No one that I spoke to on phonecalls complained about quality or feedback noise.  Well worth the price!

I ordered these before Christmas. My first order never arrived and a 2nd pair was shipped. That being said, I knew what to expect as I already had a pair that I use at work and those perform flawless. The only difference is this pair has the wireless charging case. Once  I received them, I connected them as normal and at first hey seemed to work normally. Then after a few uses, the left pod got to where it didn‚Äôt want to recognize when it was inserted in my ear. I followed the troubleshooting guide on Apple‚Äòs website and reset these AirPods and reconnected. Afterwords, they would intermittently connect normally but I always seem to have some sort of a connection issue. I called Apple support and went through the troubleshooting with them and reset them again per their method and they seemed to work correctly again. After one day the left AirPod did not want to connect again. I called Apple back and re-opened the ticket explaining the situation. They then sent a left pod only to replace what they thought was a defective one and I sent the original back. Now since connecting the new one it is doing the same thing. It takes a long time to connect if at all and most of the time will not recognize when it is inserted into my ear. At this point I am very frustrated. I know how they‚Äôre supposed to act because I have a pair that I use for work. I cannot determine what is wrong with this pair but will be calling Apple back and possibly trying to return all together.

review_title: Don‚Äôt pay attention to the negative reviews!!
product_review: All the negative reviews saying that their box didn‚Äôt come with the AirPods or that the AirPods were used/refurbished or even that they were fake AirPods seem to be false. I‚Äôm pretty sure these people that are complaining are the ones removing the AirPods and returning just the case and leaving a negative review claiming they received a fake to make themselves look like the victim. I have provided pictures and of the unboxing.

Bought these for my Wife.  It's one of those gadgets that you don't know you need until you actually have them.  She has told me for years that she didn't want/need AirPods.  As usual, I don't listen!  I finally bought her a pair.  She uses them everyday at work listening to music.  They are much more convenient than using her plug-in apple headphones.  On a personal note, Apple headphones don't stay in my ear so I will be looking at the AirPod Pros.  Not much more I can say that hasn't already been covered in other reviews.

got these for my daughter, she used them a couple times and the left one stopped working along with the case. I spent literally hours on the phone with apple trying to get the issue fixed. I had to give them another almost $200 for them to send me a replacement and once they got the broken ones back they would retuned my money. Apple support is not recommended.

I have bought about 3-4 different earbuds over the past few years.  Resistant to spend the money for the air pods.  Due to working form home and all the calls with COVID, I decided to pull the trigger.  Best thing I ever did for my conference calls and listening to music.  They change from phone to computer (PC) and back without issue.  Don't have any Bluetooth issues at all.  They don't get interference like the cheaper brands, which cut out and have signal interuption.  The only complaint I have is they are not too good for working around the house and working out.  Fall out too easy.  I am looking at aftermarket clips to address this issue.  Love the product and well worth the money.  A wireless charging case is a nice benefit luxury for the extra money.  I recommend it over the cable version.

These new ipods, received Wednesday, Nov 27, 2019, would not sync to my iPhone 8 +.  As I am an "old guy" carried them to my IT guy, who started me on Apple products a few years back, and he could not get them to sync either.  Would like to drive over to a local Apple store to see if they will exchange for me vs returning to Amazon.  Do not know if Apple/Amazon will allow that but will try Monday morning, Dec 2, 2019.  Once exchanged will reevaluate my purchase.

I bought these because I lost my first set of AirPods while traveling. I take them out of their charger, get on a zoom call and 20 minutes into the call, the battery on the ear pieces die. It's ridiculous. My first set never had these problems. I would walk for an hour or two listening to podcasts, then put them on again to watch a show without even charging in between. I don't know if I got a defective set or this is some sort of extremely well-replicated knock off but they are terrible.

I didn‚Äôt want to spend this much on earbuds honestly. I have urbeats with the lightning connector but honestly hate that it only connects to my phone and iPad. Doesn‚Äôt work on anything else. I also have the beats solo 3 which are great for travel with its battery life and optional 3.5mm cord but it‚Äôs not something I want to carry daily.  I wanted portable buds I could connect to different devices and was going to just get cheaper Bluetooth buds but decided to splurge and get these.  But now I understand why everyone has these - the ease of use. You just open and it connects to your phone.  No set up needed.  You can connect to other devices (I‚Äôve tried my laptop and kindle) by holding the pairing button.  Battery life is great - I usually only use one at a time and only use occasionally throughout the day with plenty of juice left by the end of the day - I‚Äôm sure I could last a few days on one charge. I use a 3 in 1 wireless charger for my iPhone and Apple Watch with the AirPods which works great.

I have used various great quality bluetooth headphones over the past two years, but, unfortunately, they all have terrible microphone quality. Invariably, the person on the other end of a phone call would always have a hard time hearing me and I would get hung up on by some unforgiving call centers. With these, however, people tell me that I sound like I'm on regular wired headphones. I like saving money, but ultimately, other brands aren't worth it, especially when you can't make a simple phone call.
Apple air pod with charge case

review_title: Awesome sound and great quality product.
product_review: I was skeptical about getting the AirPods because I hated spending so much money on them. My husband got them for me for my birthday and boy am I ever glad that he did. I had purchased for myself a similar product but proceeded to promptly return it after I used the AirPods. I can use them for my iPhone, iPad and iPod (yes, I still have an iPod). They were easy to pair with all three items and I can use them with whichever of the three items I happen to be using at the time. Yes, I highly recommend the AirPods. Trust me, you will NOT regret getting them.

review_title: More functional and longer play time
product_review: This is my 2nd set of pods as the 1st generation wasn't holding a good charge anymore. Great price on Amazon and I went with the wireless charger, though this has the port to still old school charge. What is really cool about these is that the double tap feature can be adjusted on the phone app. So one can fast forward and the other can rewind. Only thing I want to change is allowing to control volume, otherwise really impressive and I can use these just with my Apple watch!

review_title: Works like a charm out of the box
product_review: The sound quality is fantastic. Integrating with iPad Pro and iPhone and my MacBook Pro was quite easy. I tried jumping around and spinning, but the AirPods stayed in my ears without issue. They are quite comfortable. Can have them in all day at work and I barely notice them. My only issue, not enough to drop a star as for me it was not a big deal, is that the tapping of the AirPods to perform actions is a little difficult. I find that the touchable surface area for this is mostly covered by my ear. It takes me a few attempts to get this to work.

Apple has always had great quality to their products, with the AirPods second generation making small but functional upgrades over the first. Sound quality is great, with noise cancellation being perfectly acceptable. Where Apple really shines with AirPods is in their usability and friendliness towards other devices in the Apple ecosystem. They automatically pair when removed from the case, and automatically pause audio when removed from the ear. AirPods are also discreet, perfect for browsing PH while sitting with your family at the dinner table. The pods can be prone to falling out, but exercising and activities shouldn‚Äôt be an issue. No unsightly wires either. The charging case features a small, durable, rugged form factor that is tough and hard to break. Capable of charging AirPods 2-3 times from one charge. It fits nicely in the pocket, or chocolate starfish, wherever is more comfortable. I found many different skins for the case that fit like a glove, or a condom, which I‚Äôm told is good, I wouldn‚Äôt know, I don‚Äôt wear either.

Got these over a year ago and they have stood the test of time as far as quality. They are very sensitive and when using to speak to someone, they are very sensitive and they pick up all the sounds around you which makes it very annoying for the person you are talking too.  The sound on these are amazing. And the battery life initially was mind-blowing. After having them for a bit, if I am using them to talk on the phone and listen to some music, they won't last more than an hour. As opposed to 4-6 hours when first bought.

Item appears to be in good condition, but the description ‚Äúlike new in original packaging‚Äù was a bit much. The box was torn at one corner and, most importantly, the instructions were missing. I had to contact Apple for instructions on how to set up and use them. A small inconvenience for me, but if I had given these as a gift, I would‚Äôve been quite upset. I understand they‚Äôre ‚Äúrefurbished‚Äù, but it should at least include the instruction manual. They also weren‚Äôt charged. When I finally figured out how to set them up, the AirPods had a 12% charge and the case was at 0%.

I purchased these as a gift. My grandson really enjoys these and I can say I was impressed with the sound quality. There‚Äôs no noise cancellation, but that‚Äôs ok. The battery life is impressive as he‚Äôs charged the case and AirPods only once and it‚Äôs still going after 3 days. These are also wireless charging capable in addition to the wired charging. I give it 4 stars just because of the price. Seems a little expensive for ear buds, but my grandson loves them. He likes not having a wired set of ear buds.

review_title: One AirPod did not work! They sent me old AirPods
product_review: I contacted Apple Support because one AirPod would not pair. They looked up the serial number and reported that the AirPods I'd received- that very day- were 458 days out of warranty. My exchange is going through Apple, who promised me an entirely new set at no extra charge. Five stars for Apple, and none for Amazon. When I purchase a product that's advertised as "new", I expect it to be new. I am very displeased, Amazon.

Bought the AirPods for my wife as an anniversary gift and if any of you have been married for the 47 year range, you know finding a gift that is appropriate and welcomed is sometimes difficult. The AirPods won! She tells me she loves the clarity of the sound and also tells me she wears them while walking our wonderful dog and can still hear anything that might need to be heard like another person or a car. I also purchased the Apple Care which provides peace of mind. Yep, the old dude makes history with a purchase.

review_title: Good Sound, Good Fit, Sub-par Battery
product_review: Sounds about as good as the 15$ Vemonk WIRED earbuds to me and has a good fit in the ear (unlike the rubber cone versions which are uncomfortable to me), but the battery is only about 4 hours so if you're using them for large periods of time like I do you might need two to switch between. Still better than a 40$ pair of generic Chinese brand wireless earbuds that simply don't work, or (to me) 70$ Raycons which have my most hated design with the rubber piece so I spend double to not deal with that.

review_title: Right bud stopped working after a week
product_review: They are fun and useful. Using Siri is easy with voice command. The audio in the right bud became loud on the outside and quiet on the inside after about a week of use. We had already passed the return window by 3 days. Apple walked us through factory reset but it did not fix the problem.  They are sending a replacement in the mail, but it is disappointing for an apple product to break so quickly. Hopefully the replacement pod will not malfunction.

I ordered these thinking I was saving a little money but now I‚Äôm questioning if they are truly wireless. My wife just recieved her free set from Apple for purchasing a Mac. The box for her headphones is identical to the ‚Äúwireless‚Äù ones I purchased here on Amazon from ‚ÄúApple‚Äù. At least they are AirPods and they work great. I‚Äôm not ready for the wireless yet but was thinking when I get there would be great. If they do wireless will be a good savings if not then I just paid $10 more but did get it faster than Apple Store. Small trade offs. That‚Äôs the reason I did a 2 Star because I can‚Äôt confirm.

review_title: A boon for a weary teacher!
product_review: Our daughter teaches HS social studies, with students both in-class and online in this challenging 2020 school season of wearing masks, student distancing etc. She asked for these Airpods to help her more easily work with both kinds of students and the various platforms they are using. She's VERY happy with them and says they are, literally, a god-send! I'm glad we also ordered a case for them, because she says they are small and easily lost.

review_title: Good for iPhone, Not for PC Bluetooth
product_review: They are ok for you iPhone, SUPER EASY to pair BUT the sounds isn't great. You can buy cheap $25 bluetooth buds that sound just as fine. Hooking them up to your PC Bluetooth is TRASH! Sound is horrible. For the price, I wouldn't recommend unless you are strictly using them for your iPhone. If you want to use them for your PC that is not a Mac, go with something cheaper.

review_title: Do your research and go w a different brand
product_review: They were okay for music/listening to things on the computer/zoom type of things.  noise cancellation is absolutely horrible when you‚Äôre on the phone- people could hear my AC blasting and to them it sounded like I was in the middle of a

These are standard run of the mill air pods from apple. I wish they were louder, but they are great for truly cord free earphone experience. They dont fall out of my ears and they charge incredibly fast. They block out as much noice as the corded ones. At times people have said that they could not hear me speaking on them as well. You can connect them to non apple phones and laptops as well as use SIRI. You can also slightly customize the single and double tap feature on the left and right air pod to pause or skip forward or backwards.

review_title: It's genuine Apple AirPod 2's with wireless charging
product_review: I received genuine Apple AirPad 2's (wireless charging) in original packaging. What's to say about them that hasn't already been said? They're designed by Apple for Apple products and work exactly as described by apple, with all the features they list and nothing extra (or less). It's a big price to pay for having nearly the exact same earpiece that comes with your Apple device, just with no wires and lightning plug, but anyone interested in buying genuine Apple products knows they command premium prices.

I got these a couple weeks back and have used them every day for my workouts. The sound is good but I have one major complaint. And I‚Äôm not sure if it‚Äôs the AirPods or my phone. But every time I use them I lose my connection at least once if not more. The connection gets crackly and then just dies completely. I have to restart the app I‚Äôm using for music to get sound back. Very weird. Not thrilled about that, especially considering the price tag.

review_title: High price but not superior quality
product_review: With so many different brands of headphones, Apple ones usually stand out as the best but comes with a high price tag.  The sound quality is great but wasn‚Äôt significantly superior to other off brand

los aud√≠fonos se lo compre a mi hijo el mayor pero mi hijo el peque√±o de 4 a√±os se los puso pero al rev√©s se meti√≥ al o√≠do el palito y atr√°s del palito tiene un circulo de pl√°stico gris es como una tapita que deber√≠a estar pegada pues eso se le quedo a mi hijo adentro de o√≠do se lo tube que quitar con una pinza de verdad que susto yo no me habia dado cuenta mi hijo me dec√≠a que le molestaba algo en el o√≠do y ahi fue que me di cuenta.

Just as advertised... i've got a brand new sealed Airpods 2 with Wirless case in perfect conditions. I also checked its serial number on the Apple Site and they‚Äôre Apple Originals. No regrets. Enjoy the pictures!

review_title: Great quality I don't know what I ever did without them
product_review: They sound great and the battery life blows my mind they will last for hours I read somewhere that it was 5 and i've never counted but it seems they go a really long time and I have never once ran out of battery with the case. Ill use them for hours and once they're out of charge I pop them in for 10-20 minutes and they are back up to more than 50 percent which is plenty by the time of day I need the recharge. After a full recharge the case is usually at maybe 80 or 75 at the lowest.

review_title: Best Apple product ever? Could be!
product_review: These are the best earbuds ever. Possibly the best Apple product ever. The sound quality is great, they‚Äôre comfortable, they work out of the box (intuitively, at that), and the battery lasts forever. I‚Äôm a convert.

review_title: Are these refurbished? Innapropriate name assigned to them when connected to phone
product_review: I got these as a team gift for my boss and when she connected them to her phone the name was "Your Royal Anus's Airpods". Thank goodness my boss is awesome and thought it was hilarious but that could've been a total disaster.

review_title: Got to get my jam on!
product_review: I have tiny ears and Apple ear buds fit my ears great.  I debated for a long time if I wanted to spend the cash on wireless Air pods.  I don't regret it at all.  The batter life is so much better than other wireless earbuds I have tried,  I use them all the time.  It's a lot of cash but if you like Apple ear buds, you will love the wireless Air Pods!

review_title: Purchased because it was a requested gift
product_review: This is a very poor value, but it's more of a status symbol for teenagers which is why I ended up purchasing them.  This was requested as a birthday gift.  There are better options with better sound.  I don't think these are supposed to have noise cancellation.  In my opinion, anyone who tells you these are terrific sounding earbuds are just trying to justify their purchase.  They are not terrible.  They sound good, but they aren't the best sounding out there.
These were not Apple brand as expected . Quality is bad as well they didn‚Äôt last

a lot of people said they bought previously used ones and complained they were dirty, but i bought mine brand new and absolutely nothing was wrong with them! also i would keep an eye when looking at reviews at the dates of review. my case came with a charger but i bought a wireless one so i use the airpods one for my iphone!
Love the AirPods for falling asleep to my audiobook at night. Not having to twist around wires is great.
I would give this zero stars if I could. Received item empty - no AirPods!
Beware these airpods are not brand new they are used.

review_title: They‚Äôre Air Pods, What Else is there to say
product_review: These 3rd gen AirPods are awesome.  I take long walks in the morning with my dogs and I love being being able to listen to my music while I‚Äôm walking.  The fit my ears perfectly so I don‚Äôt have to worry about them falling out.  The sound is superb and they have lots of technical things that mean a lot.

Okay, I made fun of everyone who ever bought air pods since they came out.  not sure why I got them, but OH MY GOD.  they're great.  they're solid in my ears.  and if you take one out, the music stops playing.  so it's perfect for 1) if one "fell out" while running....which was only my fear *before* i bought them.  not after! and 2) if you need to talk to someone quickly.  as soon as you put it back in your ear it plays again.

These earbuds are dope! They stay in my ear no matter how much I move and dance. The sound, noise reduction, and overall look and feel is top notch. I also love how convenient it is to have wireless earbuds so I can move around more freely.  I really wouldn‚Äôt expect anything less from Apple.
The box was literally empty. Looked like it had been opened and taped back.

review_title: dont buy go to best buy
product_review: i just got these in the mail everything looked legit untell i was going to take the plastic off and open it up. someone had already cut into the plastic on the bottom and taken out the airpods from inside the box. I called amazon the lady was very nice but know i have to go to best buy and buy some as i need them for class tonight.

I bought these especially for the Live Listen option which essentially functions as hearing augmentation.  This works well; don‚Äôt expect perfection but you will get amplification.  Good sound quality on phone calls and people are able to hear me speaking well too.  Okay musical quality though the depth of sound could be improved.  Live Listen and phone call utility were my priorities and these are great!

I love these. Quality is better than the apple headphones the iPhone comes with. I‚Äôm hearing more sounds in the same songs than before. They fit comfortably in my ears. I can still hear things going on around me at 25% volume. At 50% volume nothing around me is audible. Comes with wireless charging case, wireless earphones, and a lightning charging cable.

review_title: These were used and sold as new.
product_review: These were represented to be a new product but when my daughter opened them fir Christmas they had clearly been used. They had dirt on the inside of the container and what appeared to be ear wax inside of them. It is too late to return them now. Unbelievable.

I believe i may of received a defective model, because sometimes i leave it plugged in for about an hour, with an iPad adapter mind you, and when i start charging the case is at 0% but when i open it and check the battery on my iPhone, it shows like 6%?!? the airpods are updated and i dont understand why the case doesnt register the actual charge on them, like this has to be a defective model, i will take them straight to apple to see if they can give me a replacement üëÄ
Enjoy for extending hours by using one bud at a time. Bought accessories to prevent loosing.
Not new airpods. Already registered and assigned to another person. Rip off.

Got this for my son‚Äôs birthday, he‚Äôs been asking for Airpods for Christmas. Basically these are 2.1 [between 2Gen and Pro], main feature differences from 2Gen: charges both wirelessly/wired, newer chip thus Siri enabled, longer battery life, slightly more affordable than Pro. Tip: $20 promo, get Apple Care, I see these smashed/littered in the park!
I bought these after being tired of always being hard wired to my phone.  I am extremely happy with the Apple AirPods.  I would have a hard time going back to being wried after using these...

Now that I am forced to work from home, I have been using these for work call and they work great.  A typical Apple product where you expect and get nothing but the best.  Trying to talk my wife into taking them so I can upgrade to the new noise canceling models.

review_title: As Perfect and Comfortabke as Can Be
product_review: These are perfect - you don‚Äôt even know you have them in your ears. And they stay put. The battery life is outstanding as well. As far as noise cancellation: I‚Äôm not looking for that because they are used while driving and walking across streets. I‚Äôm use to not having noise cancellation because I was not born w/o it.
Already broken after one year. Apple's solution: buy another one. Buy another one I won't. Will stick with Samsung or Sennheiser.

review_title: Received a used/refurbished item. Item was not new, as stated.
product_review: These AirPods have clearly been used before. They weren‚Äôt clean, they had small scratches on the charging case and they would not wireless charge.

My son saved all his Christmas and Birthday money so that he could purchase these headphones. He absolutely loves them and uses them daily. He says its well worth the money and I would agree. We go on bike rides together and he has one and I have one and they are comfortable and sound great. Pretty Impressive!

I love these AirPods. Love the wireless charging. Love the fact that the case recharged the pods when they‚Äôre not in use. Only downside is that I find myself using a high volume compared to other ear buds. Not a deal breaker, but it tells me that any active noise cancellation is minimal.

They are perfect for everyday casual listening. Everyone has different views on these but as far as I‚Äôm concerned a single pair of headphones / earphones cannot do the job of all listening devices, they each have their use and advantages. To me these are 100% for what they are.

Love them! Connected easy, works great with Spotify, charges on any Qi charger (works with my mophie charging pad), and fits my ear. I have a tragus  piercing so headphones are typically annoying. These fit well in my ear! And the noise cancelling was pretty legit/dangerous lol cause I couldn't hear a thing!

Was terrified as I only read the reviews on a hunch AFTER my order ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Thinking they‚Äôre Apple headphones and I didn‚Äôt need to know anything more . Never occurred to me that someone could sale fake ones . I made sure the seller was Amazon and not some third party seller . Do that and you should be ok

One of the best Apple products I've purchased recently. They pair easily and are great for running as they don't fall out easily. Getting a case with a keychain clip made a huge difference because I was really afraid I was going to lose them the first week. Now they are with me wherever I go and easy to keep them charged.
Had the first generations my husband took them to work and destroyed them. as promised he bought me these as a replacement they are wonderful!

I loved these at first, but then any time I talked on the phone the other person could not hear me and the noise would cut off. Very disappointed considering the reputation Apple has. Wish I could send them back for a refund. Didn't even make it half a year.

Work great daughter very happy..Holds a great charge..Funny how these kids busted are older crowds chops over wearing a ear piece for are cell phones....but now it's cool because it's an EAR POD! (I PHONE STUFF) Jerks..lol

I have constant connectivity issues with these. One will connect and the other one won‚Äôt. I just spent half an hour trying to fix the problem without any solution. What I want is just a plug-in cord for this to work but that‚Äôs not an option. Maybe Apple should get their technology to work before they deprecate solutions that actually work.

Bought it as a birthday gift for my ex boyfriend. Although he broke up with me 3 months after that, he told me this one worked very well. It‚Äôs just a bit annoying that the price dropped for 10or 20 bucks right after I bought it. But the quality was good. Can‚Äôt complain.

Got this as a gift for my husband. I was worried with some reviews saying it is a knockoff or not the real thing. I went ahead and ordered anyway. When I received it, I checked the serial online and saw it was legit. I also called, verified, and obtained warranty. I recommend doing all this if you purchase, just in case. No complaints here, it is legit and it is amazing. My husband won't stop wearing it. Lol. :)
I  bought these for my son. They can partially charged. He was able to pair them instantly and easy. Works with iPhone 7. Great sound quality. Comes with case charger. He loves em!

According to Apple, this is a Gen 2 product which was NOT the latest model when they were purchased on Amazon. In fact, they would have been several months old when sold by Amazon!! As a result, they will not honor warranty on product.

review_title: Worth the $ and perfect for gym, cleaning!
product_review: I was surprised how much I use these! I thought it was kind of pricey for headphones, but these are so incredibly useful. You can be pretty far away from your phone for them to work, too. The battery life is impressive. Perfect for runners, gym goers, cleaning!
I love my AirPods.  Normally things in my ears aren‚Äôt comfortable but I can keep these in for hours.  My only issue is I forget they are in sometimes and have list one that way.

review_title: Its what you would expect of Apple.
product_review: Quality made product as you would expect, they are hugely overpriced in my opinion but thats Apple for you.  In comparison the product is yes supererior to cheap knock offs, not really worth 8 times the price but what can you do.
Instead of turning off the music when I get a notification, it just lowers the music. I also get voice texts from Siri, which is awesome! She lets me know who's texting me and reads the texts!

Love the AirPods! I switched from Powerbeats 3 wireless to the AirPods a couple weeks ago and never looked back. Sound is incredible it recognizes when you put them in and take then out When you open the case it shows the battery leaves for both ear piece and the charging case on your iPhone
First time buying an Apple product on amazon, apparently it‚Äôs sold by Apple so it‚Äôs legit. Has warranty from Apple and is brand new. No complaints
Apple hit a homerun with the wireless ear buds and charging case. They are really easy to charge; the case fits in a pocket, and the ear buds adjust to your ears easily. These are exceptional.
I‚Äôm so proud of this purchase! I love my pods!! I use them everyday.

My wife loves these.  Bought them for her as a Mother's Day gift.  She uses they when she does her daily workout walks, gardening, cleaning the house etc.  She talks to her friends and keeps her hands free.  A+

I purchased two separate sets of these headphones from this company and both of them were defective. Would not recommend buying from this seller, first pair came broken. Left ear pod fully charged right one wouldn‚Äôt charge past 20 percent as a result they did not work. Second pair I‚Äôve had for one month same issue.
My husband loved this birthday gift the best üòä
Very easy to use and set up. Battery lasts a long time and sound is amazing. Case is very nice. Fits nice in my ear but then again everyone's ears are different.
These refused to work at all or connect to my phone period. Followed all directions. Nothing pops up on my phone to connect. Definitely not a new pair of headphones.
Use to listen to music on Apple phone primarily with these. Sound quality is awesome. Wireless. Easy to plug in to charge. Have  used for outgoing and incoming phone calls as well. Recommend.
Frequent reception problems even when phone is within 3 feet.  Right bud gets no sound at all now.  Of course--NO RETURNS!  Mistake for me to purchase these.
Love these!! My old ones you couldn‚Äôt walk across the floor without hearing your footsteps!! It was boom! Boom!!
I tried several wireless ear buds to finally find one that fits my ears.  I got these on sale during the Black Friday deals and they have been great so far.

I used to see people wearing Airpods and I‚Äôd say to myself ‚ÄúI‚Äôm never gonna buy those‚Äù but now that I own them, I feel like this is the one of the best investments. Being able to do things without having to worry about a wire is awesome.

Apple, Has Done It Again! Another Great Product And Very Clean Sounds All Around, However There Not Noise Cancellation Wireless Ear Buds. I, Hope This Helps Everyone Out. Really Happy With My Purchase.
Honestly, i have been missing on this airpods. I am so happy that i finally got them. Lol i am a budget type a person and been having my eyes on them for awhile.

Love these AirPods. I'm an old lady and they work even with my hearing aids in. I put them on, set my Spotify jazz playlist on my iPhone, put the phone in my pocket, and dance around the house. Perfect!

review_title: Would not charge using the wireless

I have a bootleg LG tone which I purchased for $10 which gives me the same sound quality and same noise cancelling as the $200 fancy apple AirPods. I would advise you to get this if you are a die hard apple fan or you want something built specifically for an iPhone. If those things are not important to you then spend $200 on a nice set of Bose headphones which can actually enhance your music listening experience.

review_title: Better Fit Than AirPods Pro... For Me!
product_review: ¬†I couldn't post this video regarding a comparison between these and the airpods pro so I thought I would post it here. If you are wondering between these and the AirPods Pro... I would go for these if they fit your ears. If normal AirPods don't fit then try the Pro's.

I was excited to get these as I am an iPhone user and needed new headphones for working out. The overall product quality is great per Apple however the design of these are flawed. During my first run one of the AirPods fell out my ear into the pavement gashing the AirPod. Thankfully it still works. Then the same happened at the gym except they fortunately just fell onto a rubber mat. These are definitely not a one size fits all product and will randomly fall out of my ears even walking around the house. The remedy to this problem has been silicone AirPod covers for $10 that better secure them in my ear. It‚Äôs annoying that I have to place on the covers before I use the AirPods and remove the covers to charge the AirPods. I probably wouldn‚Äôt buy these again and would advise anyone with apparently larger ear canals like myself to steer clear of these.

Great sound quality the battery last a long time. Exactly what I was looking for.
I bought these for my brother who is an Apple Fan and he loves them. He loves the sound quality, design, fix and compatibility with his iPhone.

Long story short, sure these are great if you already have an iOS device and want to take advantage of auto connect/play/pause, touch controls and whatever else to try and justify the price tag. If not, just save your money buy a cheaper set of generic buds and press the pause button on your screen. Personally, I have carried these and used them exclusively for almost a year and have no complaints. I highly enjoy the AirPods and the sound quality is great but nothing spectacular. They fit ok, but aren't the most comfortable buds. That said, I recently switched over to a $10 set of generic Bluetooth ear buds to carry at work and find that design to be much more comfortable, they're waterproof and I'm not nearly as worried about misplacing them.
For the price, I was actually happier with my ear buds.  The AirPods last about 4 1/2 hours.  So if you are traveling, you should make sure you are charging them, after a couple of hours of use.
